    . <!-- 6 (a) Q harum (b) Q ramya for somya -->
    .<lg n="7"><l n="a">lāvan kətərniṅ camaranya kāṅinan</l>
    .<l n="b">tan aśru miṅgut ya ta kady ameñjuha</l>
    2610<l n="c">mandrāpəpə̄ pva ṅ puputər manambaṅi</l>
    .<l n="d">sinaṅkyaniṅ pakṣi kəturnya susvara</l>
    .</lg>
    .<lg n="8"><l n="a">luṅ hiṅ vəlas-hyun ya marūm arumpvana</l>
    .<l n="b">lavan ikāṅ aṇḍiva moda tan kasah</l>
    2615<l n="c">muṅgviṅ tahən kapva sumoṅ rumambaya</l>
    .<l n="d">rinamvaniṅ śevala varṇa māsiha</l>
    .</lg>
    . <!-- 8 (a) Q marumpvana for arumpvana (c) Q i for iṅ; Q sumambeya for rumambaya -->
    .<lg n="9"><l n="a">təkvan hureniṅ prabhu sanmatān hana</l>
    2620<l n="b">latānya lumrānavəṅ i[ṅ] sukət-sukət</l>
    .<l n="c">kahyun-hyun añjrah ta vuninya yan ratəṅ</l>
    .<l n="d">vruhnya*n pamārppat luṅidiṅ vajāhirəṅ</l>
    .</lg>
    . <!-- 9 (b) = LQ, K i (d) first syllable is short m.c. -->
    2625<lg n="10"><l n="a">tiṅkah nikaṅ revata parvatāhayu</l>
    .<l n="b">nahan vinarṇākən iraṅ janardhana</l>
    .<l n="c">ṅkā teki kasthitya bhaṭāra keśava</l>
    .<l n="d">paṅə̄baniṅ dvāravatī ya tan vaneh</l>
    .</lg>
    2630 <!-- 10 (b) Liṅ niraṅ -->
    .<lg n="11"><l n="a">nāhan ta don saṅ yadu vr̥ṣṇi nityasa</l>
    .<l n="b">amr̥ddhyakən pūja sabhakty amūrṣita</l>
    .<l n="c">amrih rika svārtha umayvakən prajā</l>
    .<l n="d">pakāśrayan hetu nirāñ jayeṅ hayu</l>
    2635</lg>
    .<lg n="12"><l n="a">nāhan ta liṅ kr̥ṣṇa ri saṅ dhanañjaya</l>
    .<l n="b">ya tāmaṅun gəṅ i manah nr̥pātmaja</l>
    .<l n="c">maṅkin sirômaṅkata harṣa de nikā</l>
    .<l n="d">atūt silukniṅ palapat juraṅ-juraṅ</l>
    2640</lg>
    .<lg n="13"><l n="a">āhə̄t <hi rend="superscript">†</hi>hənunyārddha tətəl vuluh nikā</l>
    .<l n="b">tinampikiṅ māruta manda moṇḍuhan</l>
    .<l n="c">len taṅ kalusyan<hi rend="superscript">†</hi> minahāṅisis təṅah</l>
    .<l n="d">savaṅ luməṅhay haṅəsah katiṇḍihan</l>
    2645</lg>
    .<lg n="14"><l n="a">səṅkanya luṅkān umiriṅ rupit-rupit</l>
    .<l n="b">gəsiṅ pətuṅnyan mapipit paḍāṅadəg</l>
    .<l n="c">keṅis lumis kapva matanya tar miḍəm</l>
    .<l n="d">lavan [h]abuṅnyān agatəl paḍāmraṅa</l>
    2650</lg>
    . <!-- 14 (d) L əbuṅ, Q həbaṅ -->
    .<lg n="15"><l n="a">taṅheh vivākṣan [r]yy alivat nireṅ sukət</l>
    .<l n="b">makin kacuṇḍuk kalaṅə̄nya de nira</l>
    .<l n="c">ṅkānan tinəṅhānilumañ jugeṅ hayu</l>
    2655<l n="d">pacaṅkraman rāmya laṅə̄nyan uttama</l>
    .</lg>
    . <!-- 15 (a) = LQ (b) Q maṅkin for makin -->
    .</div>
    .<div type="canto" rend="met" n="41" met="jagaddhita">
    2660<lg n="1"><l n="a">vvaṅ ri jro nagarālaṅə̄ paḍa katon raras ika kadi vimbaniṅ tulis</l>
    .<l n="b">rāmyānəmpala puṣpa pādapa haṅendahi hayu nika kapva komala</l>
    .<l n="c">lvir hintən liniṅir patiṅhalan ikāṅləṅəṅ amija-mijah macaṅkrama</l>
    .<l n="d">utpatti ṅ kalaṅə̄n ayunyan aśarīra vahu mijil i pañjrahiṅ səkar</l>
    .</lg>
    2665<lg n="2"><l n="a">kīrṇekāṅ ahajə̄ṅ manisnya sakadaṅ mvaṅ asana vahu vanva riṅ nadī</l>
    .<l n="b">len mahyas haṅilo rikaṅ vvay amatəh gəluṅ ika vinahan susup-susup</l>
    .<l n="c">dudv īkan paṅuḍoḍa tapvan ahuyaṅ svaṅ aṅivagi kucupniṅ erttali</l>
    .<l n="d">kahyun-hyun haməḍar pva ros ni paṅavaknya hana hanuji kaṅsyaniṅ smara</l>
    .</lg>
    2670 <!-- 2 (a) L -ekaṅ (c) S kucur for kucup -->
    .<lg n="3"><l n="a">strī-stry ārjāsəmu citra molah amanis pamatan ika ri denya yan liriṅ</l>
    .<l n="b">darpāveh lara rāga tan cala patahnya makiris anamar ghaṇāhirəṅ</l>
    .<l n="c">ambətniṅ paṅavaknya təkvan akarah kaluṅ asana lavan vəlas-harəp</l>
    .<l n="d">himpər manmatha sr̥ṣṭi-sañcaya hayunya kinəḍapan i rāganiṅ maṅə̄</l>
    2675</lg>
    .<lg n="4"><l n="a">len taṅ tibra ləṅə̄ṅ mulat ri*ləyəpiṅ jaladhi hayu nikāṅgagat lulut</l>
    .<l n="b">paṅdeniṅ kalaṅə̄n rarasnya tan i rāt rasa maluya hajə̄ṅnya riṅ ṭika</l>
    .<l n="c">tan seṅəh kahuvan təṅahnya ri paṅol ni tali-tali nikān dadak lukar</l>
    .<l n="d">keṅis mātra savaṅ gaḍiṅ saphala paṅhurusakəna* rikaṅ jayendriya</l>
    2680</lg>
    . <!-- 4 (a) = LQ K li -->
    .<lg n="5"><l n="a">vvanten rūmnya vagəd cumāmpaka kapantəs ika linaraṅiṅ manobhava</l>
    .<l n="b">denyāmaṅku puḍak vaśāṅisisakən vətis ika kadi hetuniṅ javuh</l>
    .<l n="c">raśminyān panulis ṭikānak-anakanya hinuḍaran ikeṅ nakāluṅid</l>
    2685<l n="d">sarvvecchāsidəheṅ karaṅ təhər anuṅkuli kaləṅəṅaniṅ vvayiṅ juraṅ</l>
    .</lg>
    . <!-- 5 (b) R inserts (təṅah) before vətis -->
    .<lg n="6"><l n="a">ānyāt ta[ṅ] sumareṅ śilā śayana raśmi nikan inapi mūrttiniṅ puḍak</l>
    .<l n="b">rūmniṅ pādapa len mənur tila-tilamnya jənək i ləyəpiṅ laṅit ləṅə̄ṅ</l>
    2690<l n="c">gātranyānvam avarṇa sinvamiṅ aśoka sinavava təṅahnyan aṅligā</l>
    .<l n="d">byaktālūma yadin linakṣyakəna riṅ śayana təkap ikaṅ smarātura</l>
    .</lg>
    . <!-- 6 (a) = LQ; S omitsn -->
    .<lg n="7"><l n="a">gundik rāmya mavā laṅə̄nya mavilāśa sumalaga ləvas raras nikā</l>
    2695<l n="b">hāmhāmnyān paṅusir manis paḍa rumūpaka raras aṅənoh kinonəṅan</l>
    .<l n="c">harṣanyan pamabak-mabak kusuma sinvam apənəd avahəl-vahəl vuṅū</l>
    .<l n="d">lindinyan hamərəh-mərəh sama-samāṅrahatakəna gəsəṅnya molaha</l>
    .</lg>
    .<lg n="8"><l n="a">lvir tan varśih apet kalaṅvan agalar-galar asana miṅiṅ lavan mənur</l>
    2700<l n="b">tañjuṅ mvaṅ priyakārjja məmbaṅ inaṅitnya sinahaja pakə̄ nikaṅ gəluṅ </l>
    .<l n="c">rupnyānvam taravarṣa roma saha nopura hinadu manis luṅiṅ gaḍuṅ</l>
    .<l n="d">sumrak rūm ni vijaṅnya təkvan akase hr̥buk arəja təkeṅ payodhara</l>
    .</lg>
    .<lg n="9"><l n="a">akveh ṅganya pamiṇḍaniṅ raras ikaṅ vvaṅ ahayu yadiyan kathākəna</l>
    2705<l n="b">nistanyan taya paṅharusnya ri manis ni hayunira saṅ aṅdiri ṅ daləm</l>
    .<l n="c">simbantən maṇikiṅ purī marəki varṇanira viphala rūm nikākalib</l>
    .<l n="d">hīṅanyan sira sāriniṅ [ha]hayu* sūkṣma ni kaləṅəṅaniṅ tasik madhu</l>
    .</lg>
    . <!-- 9 (a) L yadyan; L kathakəna (d) K hayu LQ ahayu -->
    2710<lg n="10"><l n="a">ānyāt teki parantyaniṅ kaləṅəṅan kadi haniriṅi rāmyaniṅ tulis</l>
    .<l n="b">aṅlīlā pinahat karaṅ tuvi rəcəp niki jinamaṇikeṅ vəlas-harəp</l>
    .<l n="c">honya ṅ jaṅga mure mareṅ liraṅ apiṇḍa lalayan ika rāmya tūt sisi</l>
    .<l n="d">molur keṅgutaniṅ samīraṇa vaṅinyan aṅasəpi sumār nirāntara</l>
    .</lg>
    2715<lg n="11"><l n="a">nāhan parṇah irān rəsəp lumihatiṅ kaka paḍa tinameṅ gitālaṅə̄</l>
    .<l n="b">maṅkin lvir prathimāṅaraṅ hayu nirān hana hamarəkakən puḍak miṅiṅ</l>
    .<l n="c">ndāñ jātīnira tapva rañca sira kevala puji-puji ratnaniṅ purī</l>
    .<l n="d">varṇākāra nikaṅ madhu drava katon yan aṅucapa sirāparan kunəṅ</l>
    .</lg>
    2720 <!-- 11 (c) L jāti -->
    .<lg n="12"><l n="a">siṅgih yan sira hatvikiṅ raras arūm maṇikiṅ ahayu jīvaniṅ sarāt</l>
    .<l n="b">bhrantā ṅ satpada riṅ puḍak milu lələh tan avəliṅ aṅaras ri jə̄ṅ nira</l>
    .<l n="c">aṅgə̄ṅ tan makalib salah ṅ iḍəp anon ri səḍəṅira haneṅ karaṅ liman</l>
    .<l n="d">hyaṅ-hyaṅniṅ kalaṅə̄n valiṅniṅ umulat kṣaṇa maluya mareṅ nirātmaka</l>
    2725</lg>
    .<lg n="13"><l n="a">ndin tan bhagna larut raras ni vijiniṅ sumanasa kalavan puḍak sumār</l>
    .<l n="b">yadyastun racaneṅ pralāpita kapāna vənaṅaniṅ amarvane sira</l>
    .<l n="c">māntən denya ya tan pupug luṅid ikaṅ tanahiṅ aṅapi tibra tan padon</l>
    .<l n="d">lit-litniṅ karas ārjja həntya tamatan palaca-laca hirəṅnya de nira</l>
    2730</lg>
    .<lg n="14"><l n="a">byakta syūha laṅə̄ nikaṅ pasir arəs vinaḍal i ləvu tan panoliha</l>
    .<l n="b">lāvan parvvata śīrṇa tan vani gumāp təkapira kadi māryya ləṅləṅa</l>
    .<l n="c">mogāsep ləṅəṅiṅ tavaṅ yan ika vastvakəna niyata nirva kiṅkiṅa</l>
    .<l n="d">śrīniṅ tāman amukṣa raśmi nika yadyapi mamaṅun aśoka tan təpət</l>
    2735</lg>
    . <!-- 14 (a) L syuha; R inserts (adoh) after pasir -->
    .</div>
    .<div type="canto" rend="met" n="42" met="praharṣiṇī">
    .<lg n="1"><l n="a">ṅkā saṅ pārtha sira ḍatəṅ tumūt ri kr̥ṣṇa</l>
    2740<l n="b">harṣāmbəknira mulatiṅ vanādri rāmya</l>
    .<l n="c">ndan saṅ phalguṇa sira mogha tibra ləṅləṅ</l>
    .<l n="d">muṅgviṅ tvas nr̥paduhitā maveh prapañca</l>
    .</lg>
    .<lg n="2"><l n="a">nā marmā nr̥patanayātañe narendra</l>
    2745<l n="b">yeko saṅ hinucap anindyarājaputrī</l>
    .<l n="c">lakṣmīniṅ raras ahajə̄ṅ tikuṅ subhadrā</l>
    .<l n="d">putri śrī nr̥pa basudeva ratnakanyā</l>
    .</lg>
    .<lg n="3"><l n="a">siṅgih tan papaḍa sireṅ jagat samasta</l>
    2750<l n="b">ndya ṅvaṅ rāsika tan akūṅa denya mūrccha</l>
    .<l n="c">aṅhiṅ rūm nika taya len paran ya rāgī</l>
    .<l n="d">mās ratnôttama tar ivəh vəlinya yogya</l>
    .</lg>
    . <!-- 3 (a) S samanta -->
    2755<lg n="4"><l n="a">maṅkā liṅnira sumahur narāryya kr̥ṣṇa</l>
    .<l n="b">om siṅgih ya tika nahan valiṅta rakryan </l>
    .<l n="c">yeky āntənkva tuvi rare səḍəṅ sukanyā</l>
    .<l n="d">vastv evəh karaṇa nikān vineh atəmva</l>
    .</lg>
    2760 <!-- 4 (c) S kunəṅ ndatan vanehan for tuvi rare səḍəṅ sukanyā -->
    .<lg n="5"><l n="a">aṅhiṅ prārthana gavayən svayambarātah</l>
    .<l n="b">yan sahyāharaṇa kunəṅ ndatan vanehan </l>
    .<l n="c">yan vvantən ta sira mahāpravīra śakti </l>
    .<l n="d">vāny āṅambila tan arəs ri sanmukaṅku</l>
    2765</lg>
    . <!-- 5 (a) L ṅhiṅ saṅ Pārtha na for ṅhiṅ prārthana -->
    .<lg n="6"><l n="a">sugyanyāṅavaśakəne tuvuh ny ariṅku</l>
    .<l n="b">mvaṅ tañ jrih tumahəna vīra vr̥ṣṇivaṅśa</l>
    .<l n="c">ndah nāhan liṅira janardhanātərəh bvat</l>
    2770<l n="d">kady āṅgəṅ mavəṅis i citta paṇḍuputra</l>
    .</lg>
    .<lg n="7"><l n="a">saṅ pārthāta sira sudhīra tan hanāvri</l>
    .<l n="b">sakvehnyan vənaṅ umavit syuhənkva śīrṇa</l>
    .<l n="c">nāhan liṅnira tumuluy madəg sirôjar</l>
    2775<l n="d">ndātañ jrih ri yadu kabeh vavaṅ ta maṅsə̄</l>
    .</lg>
    .<lg n="8"><l n="a">sāglisnyan hinalapakən narendraputrī</l>
    .<l n="b">kumyus mūrcchita viparīta yan pinaṅkva</l>
    .<l n="c">muṅgah riṅ ratha pinəkul gupe sirārəs </l>
    2780<l n="d">byaktekin vinavan irāhañaṅ visāta</l>
    .</lg>
    . <!-- 8 (a) S maṅgəh for muṅgah -->
    .<lg n="9"><l n="a">ndah maṅkā ṅ yadubala kapva dīnacitta</l>
    .<l n="b">sakvehnyālara mabunək ndatan tinaṅgəl</l>
    2785<l n="c">āśābhūta maṅən-aṅən [r]yy avaknya nirdon</l>
    .<l n="d">denyan tuccha lalu kumə̄l dumehnya luṅhā</l>
    .</lg>
    . <!-- 9 (a) L maṅkān ṅ, S maṅkyaṅ for maṅka ṅ (c) = LQ -->
    .</div>
    2790<div type="canto" rend="met" n="43" met="suvadanā">
    .<lg n="1"><l n="a">saṅsiptan lvir narāryyārjjuna tucapa tikaṅ vr̥ṣṇin kapalajə̄ṅ</l>
    .<l n="b">prāptānambah mare śrī haladhara mavarah reh pārtha ri sira</l>
    .<l n="c">yekān sakrodha saṅ bhūpati vavaṅ aṅadəg taṅ mānavibhava</l>
    .<l n="d">muntab sə̄ṅniṅ vulat kady alatu-latu sake bāṅniṅ muka nira</l>
    2795</lg>
    .<lg n="2"><l n="a">ndah śīghrāṅambuṣātyanta təkap i pamanasniṅ krodha kumutug</l>
    .<l n="b">dhik hāh pārthātiḍuṣṭādhama niyata katon śīrṇanya pususən</l>
    .<l n="c">nāhan liṅ saṅ narendra krama madəg aṅalap śaktyāyudha magə̄ṅ</l>
    .<l n="d">maṅkin kady anyuha ṅ rāt mvaṅ amalika tasik rudrāgni sakala</l>
    2800</lg>
    .<lg n="3"><l n="a">sakvehniṅ rājaputra pramuka haji parəṅ sakrodha suməgut</l>
    .<l n="b">təkvan kapvātirodrāgaravalan aṅadəg lvir siṅha masiga</l>
    .<l n="c">pradyumna mvaṅ gadā satyaka niśaṭha vaneh sāmbhāśru maganas</l>
    .<l n="d">kapvātyanteṅ mahāśakti tuvi kalilipiṅ siṅhākr̥ti sira</l>
    2805</lg>
    .<lg n="4"><l n="a">mvaṅ tekaṅ vr̥ṣṇi rotāṅjuru sahana nikin kakyāti nipuna</l>
    .<l n="b">tovin śūrānivaryyeṅ raṇa jaya kinavih maṅgəh kr̥tayaśa</l>
    .<l n="c">tāvak* yan daitya len rākṣasa kapana ya tan sāñcurṇa yan asə̄</l>
    .<l n="d">maṅken <hi rend="superscript">†</hi>krodhāṅgakārāṅgətəm aruh-aruhan vetnyārddha magələṅ</l>
    2810</lg>
    . <!-- 4 (c) LQ tāvat (d) S maṅkin for maṅken -->
    .<lg n="5"><l n="a">lvir syūha ṅ revatāvrəg kənas ika təkapiṅ śaṅkātri tinulup</l>
    .<l n="b">gəntər<hi rend="superscript">†</hi>niṅ bheri lāvan kala-kala kumisik yekān muni parəṅ</l>
    .<l n="c">lāvan pārguṅ nikaṅ sāmaja kuda gumuruh paṅhriknyan aṅuhuh</l>
    2815<l n="d">nānāvarṇāsulam təṅran ika katulajəg sarvvāstra lumarap</l>
    .</lg>
    . <!-- 5 (a) L syuha -->
    .<lg n="6"><l n="a">saṅkəp sakveh nikaṅ yodhagaṇa bala pənuh lvir tan patagihan</l>
    .<l n="b">āmbəknyāṅgə̄ṅ kaśūran makin aṅipak-ipak tulyārṇava pasaṅ</l>
    2820<l n="c">maṅgəh sāmpun hinajñan sajuru-juru dumon pārtha prih usirən</l>
    .<l n="d">nā hetunyan paḍāgyā guragaḍa maharəp hāmhām tan atakut</l>
    .</lg>
    . <!-- 6 (a) Q omits bala -->
    .<lg n="7"><l n="a">gə̄ṅ-gə̄ṅən krūra mākrak kagiri-giri katon tekaṅ yadu kabeh</l>
    2825<l n="b">kevalyāmātyana ṅ pārtha liṅ ika rarahən rohən tan inaris </l>
    .<l n="c">kapvānambut laras mvaṅ palaga nika kabeh sakvehnya tumihaṅ</l>
    .<l n="d">garvvanyan kapva tulyāntaka sahana nikin magyāṅala-hala</l>
    .</lg>
    .<lg n="8"><l n="a">vāgyūt [t]aṅ vīra maṅkat saha bala lumurug ryy āṅkat haladhara</l>
    2830<l n="b">kapvārāmpak guməntər kakərətug asəlur denyan silih ayun</l>
    .<l n="c">cuṇḍuk śrī kr̥ṣṇa tapvan haruhara ya tikin cittanyan atəgəg</l>
    .<l n="d">yekāṅde gadgada śrī haladhara lumihat de saṅ narapati</l>
    .</lg>
    . <!-- 8 (a) = Q -->
    2835<lg n="9"><l n="a">ṅkā rakvān śīghra maṅsə̄ ta sira mujarakən <hi rend="superscript">†</hi>śrī kr̥ṣṇa tumuluy</l>
    .<l n="b">āyay hantən ndya donta prih umənəṅ i ləkasniṅ pārtha vipata</l>
    .<l n="c">nir taṅ sānak pva yāṅgəhnya taya ṅ iṅət-iṅət<hi rend="superscript">†</hi> ḍo hayva tinahā</l>
    .<l n="d">vyartthān sāmpun pinūjāpratihata rahajə̄ṅ sāmpūrṇa hinivə̄ </l>
    .</lg>
    2840<lg n="10"><l n="a">yekin sampaynya yak ton ləvəs aṅapa karih denyāṅapuyana </l>
    .<l n="b">dhik dhūrttāpa kramāṅgə̄ṅ kuhaka juga tikī nirśānta magələh</l>
    .<l n="c">sis tan vriṅ tvaṅ humə̄t riṅ smr̥ti vənaṅ avamānāntənta hinañaṅ</l>
    .<l n="d">gə̄ṅ mūrka crol ya tekā niradara katuluy denyāṅdəha hulu</l>
    .</lg>
    2845<lg n="11"><l n="a">nāhan tôjar nirāpyak irika ta sumahur śrī kr̥ṣṇa ri sira</l>
    .<l n="b">ḍū sojar śrī narāryyātiśaya mara hiḍəp saṅ nātha tan ade</l>
    .<l n="c">jātī ṅvaṅ vīra bhūpālaka saphala jayā lumreṅ tribhuvana</l>
    .<l n="d">gə̄ṅniṅ śaktinta sākṣāt jalanidhi vinuvus atyanta madaləm</l>
    .</lg>
    2850</div>
    .<div type="canto" rend="met" n="44" met="turagagati">
    .<lg n="1"><l n="a">nda nihan paramārtha tūtananta</l>
    .<l n="b">purihiṅ paṇḍita riṅ jagat guṇajña</l>
    .<l n="c">taya lamban amet viveka yukti</l>
    2855<l n="d">tar ivəh riṅ maganal halit kaveśa</l>
    .</lg>
    . <!-- 1 (a) R ndan (b) S guṇajñana -->
    .<lg n="2"><l n="a">vvaya taṅ hari len sahāya tonton</l>
    .<l n="b">ya lanāmiṇḍa paḍātisūkṣma kālih</l>
    2860<l n="c">pamihaṅ nikanaṅ hajə̄ṅ gatinya</l>
    .<l n="d">ya tikā hetu nikaṅ hayun kadadya</l>
    .</lg>
    .<lg n="3"><l n="a">kita ta prabhu riṅ jagat viśuddha</l>
    .<l n="b">ikanaṅ durnaya tan haneka mātra</l>
    2865<l n="c">kadi bahni mahojvala prakāśa</l>
    .<l n="d">hilaṅiṅ sarvva kaləṅka donta nitya</l>
    .</lg>
    . <!-- 3 (d) S milaṅaṅ for hilaṅ iṅ; S kaləṅkan for kaləṅka -->
    .<lg n="4"><l n="a">amr̥tātmaka tulya riṅ halaṅghya</l>
    2870<l n="b">umañut vyāparaniṅ kaluṣya citta</l>
    .<l n="c">tuvuhiṅ yaśa dharmma śuddhadeha</l>
    .<l n="d">kita ta śreṣṭhi <foreign>rikā</foreign> kabeh byavasta</l>
    .</lg>
    . <!-- 4 (d) S omits ta; MSS rika -->
    2875<lg n="5"><l n="a">iti marmma nikin humodana svī</l>
    .<l n="b">takari ṅ hīna haṅalpa buddhi nātha</l>
    .<l n="c">si dhanañjaya liṅta yar masampe</l>
    .<l n="d">katuluy tvaṅnya magə̄ṅ nahan hiḍəpku</l>
    .</lg>
    2880<lg n="6"><l n="a">nya dələ̄n prabhu yogya liṅnya sādhu</l>
    .<l n="b">yan ikaṅ strījana vəlyaniṅ [h]apeṇi</l>
    .<l n="c">mvaṅ ikaṅ maṇi ratna kañcanādi</l>
    .<l n="d">ya tan olin paśujāti kāṣṭa hīna</l>
    .</lg>
    2885 <!-- 6 (b) = L -->
    .<lg n="7"><l n="a">ndi ta saṅ minahān tinonta riṅ rāt</l>
    .<l n="b">agələm dumval anakniran sukanyā</l>
    .<l n="c">kinayogya kəta ṅ svayambarātah</l>
    .<l n="d">tan ahāt rakva sireṅ adharmma riṅ rāt</l>
    2890</lg>
    . <!-- 7 (c) S sinvayambarā- -->
    .<lg n="8"><l n="a">nda məne apa tan kināryya ri ṅke</l>
    .<l n="b">ikanaṅ kārmma viśeṣa dharmma yukti</l>
    .<l n="c">ya ta hetu dhanañjayāpravr̥tti</l>
    2895<l n="d">vara sahyāharaṇa ndatan ya hīna</l>
    .</lg>
    .<lg n="9"><l n="a">nya katon paṅaḍānya vīra śakti</l>
    .<l n="b">ya pinintonakənānivaryya deha</l>
    .<l n="c">ri vənaṅnya malap rikeṅ* subhadrā</l>
    2900<l n="d">takarih parcaya de nikaṅ kaśaktin</l>
    .</lg>
    . <!-- 9 (c) Q rikaṅ -->
    .</div>
    .<div type="canto" rend="met" n="45" met="mr̥dukomala">
    2905<lg n="1"><l n="a">yan svīnən pva ya de nareśvara hade hiḍəpku viphala</l>
    .<l n="b">āpan byakta katoñ jayārtha nika riṅ svayambara daṅū</l>
    .<l n="c">yadyastun hana teki ganta nika yan prihən kavənaṅa</l>
    .<l n="d">tā ṅvaṅ śakti vənaṅ mamaṅpaṅa guṇanya mon surapati</l>
    .</lg>
    2910 <!-- 1 (a) Q narendra ta for nareśvara -->
    .<lg n="2"><l n="a">an sāmpun karəṅə̄ pratāpa naranātha digjaya kita</l>
    .<l n="b">yapvan sora kiteṅ parakrama təkapnya keraṅ-iraṅa</l>
    .<l n="c">saṅkṣepanya haneki rakva kaləhəṅnya tak magalaka</l>
    .<l n="d">tūtən tann apalenaniṅ yaśa tinuṅgaliṅ parahita</l>
    2915</lg>
    .<lg n="3"><l n="a">nyā taṅ deya hitāvaśāṇa gəlarən təkap saṅ ahulun</l>
    .<l n="b">tapvan piṇḍah akon umundaṅa rikaṅ dhanañjaya usə̄n</l>
    .<l n="c">toh pūjān varaṅən śramākəna huvus nda hayva viluma</l>
    .<l n="d">donyātūta lavan sa-paṇḍava pasānakanta rahajə̄ṅ</l>
    2920</lg>
    . <!-- 3 (a) Q deha (b) Q umundaṅ irikaṅ (c) S smarakəna -->
    .<lg n="4"><l n="a">aṅhiṅ maṅgəh i buddhi ni ṅvaṅ apa tan vaneh ṅaran ikā</l>
    .<l n="b">hetunyan tan akūṅa riṅ vimukatāṅatīta hənəṅa</l>
    .<l n="c">nāhan liṅnira kr̥ṣṇa nora vinihaṅ təkap yadu kabeh</l>
    2925<l n="d">tulyāg[n]y āṅabaran galaknira kavarṣan āmrəta haji</l>
    .</lg>
    . <!-- 4 (d) = LQ -->
    .<lg n="5"><l n="a">somya śrī baladeva denira narāryya kr̥ṣṇa sakarəṅ</l>
    .<l n="b">ṅkān maṇḍəg vəkasan kabeh sumalahiṅ varāstra palaga</l>
    2930<l n="c">tan dvādan tumuluy humundaṅa ta saṅ narendratanaya</l>
    .<l n="d">gəṇḍiṅ rāmya ləṅə̄ṅ svaranya makapaṅharəp laku nira</l>
    .</lg>
    .<lg n="6"><l n="a">maṅkat saṅ para rājaputra saha bhr̥tya kapva mahaləp</l>
    .<l n="b">hopən pasraṅ ikaṅ karaṇḍanira sə̄h tikaṅ gaja ratha</l>
    2935<l n="c">lvir <foreign>tūban</foreign> kumusuh grəbəg ni lakuniṅ vvaṅ ākrəp aṅiriṅ</l>
    .<l n="d">sahyābhūṣaṇa varṇa puṣpa vana komalālaku-laku</l>
    .</lg>
    . <!-- 6 (b) Q ika forira (c) MSS tuban -->
    .<lg n="7"><l n="a">lāvan təṅran aneka varṇa madulur haləp vinulatan</l>
    2940<l n="b">abhrāpiṇḍa kuvuṅ-kuvuṅ manuruniṅ səkar sumalaga</l>
    .<l n="c">lāmpahniṅ ratha len liman kuda savaṅ karaṅnyan alaṅə̄</l>
    .<l n="d">luṅkanyāntaraniṅ lumāmpah aḍarat matambəh arivəg</l>
    .</lg>
    .<lg n="8"><l n="a">tan varṇan ta sireṅ havan nr̥patiputra pārtha vuvusən</l>
    2945<l n="b">ṅkān paṅrəgrəg aṅolakən saṅ ahajə̄ṅ sirepu tan arən</l>
    .<l n="c">maṅkin tan humənəṅ sirārddha sumave ri saṅ yadu kabeh</l>
    .<l n="d">lvir mātyāṅəsahiṅ kisapvanira tan vri rāt kaḍəḍətan</l>
    .</lg>
    .<lg n="9"><l n="a">hetunyan hinimūr savet ni rarasiṅ priyambada sira</l>
    2950<l n="b">māskv induṅ palalunta māsku kapanan valuy kita məne</l>
    .<l n="c">heman rūmta yadin haṅiṣṭya luputanta riṅ karatala</l>
    .<l n="d">lvāmbək tebu huvus purākr̥ta kabhukti denta kavava</l>
    .</lg>
    .<lg n="10"><l n="a">maṅke byakta panəmva ni ṅhulun i māsku ratnaduhitā</l>
    2955<l n="b">yogyān rūmta siluṅluṅaṅkva musireṅ kasiṅhan ayaśa</l>
    .<l n="c">maṅgəh prārthana ni ṅhulun rəbutəniṅ lavan tan avəḍi</l>
    .<l n="d">hīṅanyan kinaniścayaṅkva mapage kabehnya ḍatəṅa</l>
    .</lg>
    .<lg n="11"><l n="a">kasniṅ bāhu nahan ta tiṅhalana śulka riṅ kadi kita</l>
    2960<l n="b">tan mithyāku kitāta sakṣya ri kaśūran i ṅhulun ibu</l>
    .<l n="c">maṅkā śabda narāryya pārtha saha marmmarāñulu-ñuluh</l>
    .<l n="d">aṅhiṅ drəs nikaṅ aśrupāta panulak saṅ onək aṅəsah</l>
    .</lg>
    .<lg n="12"><l n="a">akveh deniran amrahāsana ri saṅ prapañca malara</l>
    2965<l n="b">ṅkānan rakva ḍatəṅ vatək yadu kinon umiñjəmi sira</l>
    .<l n="c">aṅhilyākəna sopakāra savilāśaniṅ mamapaga</l>
    .<l n="d">kapvāvvat ri giraṅ nirān ḍatəṅ amūrṣite nr̥pasuta</l>
    .</lg>
    .<lg n="13"><l n="a">t āntuk māsku ri saṅ nareśvara nihan pakonira huvus</l>
    2970<l n="b">mvaṅ devī sira karva keriṅa t ulih pareṅ pura məne</l>
    .<l n="c">āpan tuṣṭa dahat manah saṅ ahulun humundaṅa kita</l>
    .<l n="d">tan pendah hati*niṅ liraṅ vinilətiṅ gaḍuṅ juga sira</l>
    .</lg>
    . <!-- 13 (d) LQ gati -->
    2975<lg n="14"><l n="a">nā liṅ saṅ para rājaputra suka saṅ narendratanaya</l>
    .<l n="b">luṅhā ṅ ārkka samāntarān laku nirān umantuk iniriṅ</l>
    .<l n="c">muṅgviṅ ḍampa vuluṅ səsə̄k lakuniṅ aṅrakət ndan ahaləp</l>
    .<l n="d">lvir nārīśvara sārdhadeha manurun hanopama sira</l>
    .</lg>
    2980 <!-- 14 (d) Q nareśvari -->
    .<lg n="15"><l n="a">ndan saṅ śrī naranātha kr̥ṣṇa ri yavā lavan haladhara</l>
    .<l n="b">maṅkā ṅ strī haji kapva rāmya suməneha meh təka nira</l>
    .<l n="c">māvāvās ri sənə̄ nikaṅ sulu[h] aneka piṇḍa rahina</l>
    .<l n="d">lvir mājar sukaniṅ sarājya kisikiṅ garantuṅ araras</l>
    2985</lg>
    . <!-- 15 (b) S təkə (c) = LQ (d) S surājya -->
    .<lg n="16"><l n="a">ndah ṅkā prāpta dhanañjaya mvaṅ iki saṅ narendraduhitā</l>
    .<l n="b">ṅkā rakvān paṅusap ri jə̄ṅnira narāryya kālih papupul</l>
    .<l n="c">təkvan māri vival narendra baladeva harṣa masəgəh</l>
    2990<l n="d">siddhāniṅ paramārtha saṅ nr̥pati kr̥ṣṇa nora kahala</l>
    .</lg>
    . <!-- 16 (b) L paṅucap for paṅusap -->
    .<lg n="17"><l n="a">sāmpun maṅkat adūta saṅ nr̥pati mantukeṅ purasabhā</l>
    .<l n="b">ṅkane jə̄ṅ basudeva nātha mavarah ri tiṅkahan ira</l>
    2995<l n="c">byātītan ri lakunya saṅ pravara phalguṇāta valuyan</l>
    .<l n="d">rāmyārūm papupul nireṅ kuvu lavan vatək yadu kabeh</l>
    .</lg>
    . <!-- 17 (a) Q maṅkat ta (d) S apupul; S kuva -->
    .<lg n="18"><l n="a">maṅkin sə̄h avuvuh viśeṣa paṅivə̄ nire nr̥pasuta</l>
    3000<l n="b">salvirniṅ [h]upabhoga ṣadrasa huvus dine pva ya hana</l>
    .<l n="c">ndātan pis ta təkap narendra harimūrtti sapriya tuvi</l>
    .<l n="d">āpañ jātiniran kr̥tajña kajanapriyañ juga lanā</l>
    .</lg>
    . <!-- 18 (b) MSS upabhoga -->
    3005<lg n="19"><l n="a">byātītan ri səḍəṅ ni saṅ pravara paṇḍuputra hinivə̄</l>
    .<l n="b">luṅhā pva ṅ vəṅikāla sākṣaṇa pakəg nikaṅ sanagara</l>
    .<l n="c">məntas riṅ vəkasan təkā ṅ rahina kapva sāmpun avuṅu</l>
    .<l n="d">ṅkān mantuk sira saṅ narāryya dinulur nikaṅ yadukula</l>
    .</lg>
    3010<lg n="20"><l n="a">saṅ pārtha pva sireniriṅ mvaṅ ika saṅ narendraduhitā</l>
    .<l n="b">ṅkā riṅ dvāravatī <foreign>sirāstu</foreign> pinapak təkap saṅ ahulun</l>
    .<l n="c">nya ṅ pāṇigraha kāryya maṅgala vivāha kārmma gavayən</l>
    .<l n="d">āpan ya pranidhāna saṅ nr̥pati kr̥ṣṇa yan paṅucapa</l>
    .</lg>
    3015 <!-- 20 (a) R sirehiriṅ (b) MSS sirastu -->
    .</div>
    .<div type="canto" rend="met" n="46" real="-+---+-+---+------+-+---=">
    .<note>Meter called Virat Nətəg by Creese.</note>
    .<lg n="1">
    3020<l n="a">ḍatəṅ ta sira saṅ vatək yadu haneṅ nagara lagi sinuṅsuṅiṅ vvaṅ aṅuṅaṅ</l>
    .<l n="b">manahnya paḍa kāñaran mulat i saṅ nr̥patanaya sirādhikāra karəṅə̄</l>
    .<l n="c">ya hetu niki kapva māprəgi savetniṅ abhinava vavaṅ marāmpak i yava</l>
    .<l n="d">rare matuha len ulañjar aṅaḍaṅ hana lilu tumakul ya milva mijila</l>
    .</lg>
    3025 <!-- 1 (d) Q vulañjar -->
    .<lg n="2">
    .<l n="a">paḍāgaravalan parəṅ kapalayū hanan aṅuhuh arəpnya tan karuhuna</l>
    .<l n="b">silih səḍək arok vaneh taṅ apipit-pipit aruh-aruhan tayeṅ ləbuh agə̄ṅ</l>
    .<l n="c">alah ya nirupekṣa riṅ hyas asuluṅ-suluṅ arəbut anon ri saṅ nr̥pasuta</l>
    3030<l n="d">dudū taṅ amahayva kenya umijil ya katərag alayū ndatan dva kavudan</l>
    .</lg>
    . <!-- 2 (a) Q kapilayu; S aṅubah for aṅuhuh; S kavruhana for karuhuna (d) Q kataragal alayu for katərag alayu -->
    .<lg n="3">
    .<l n="a">atīta ri ḍatəṅ dhanañjaya lavan narapati madulur cumuṇḍuk i daləm</l>
    3035<l n="b">yathākrama sirāṅusap ləmah i jə̄ṅ narapati basudeva len nr̥pavadhū</l>
    .<l n="c">kataṅgama sire dhanañjaya apan lituhayu tuvi śūra śakti guṇavān</l>
    .<l n="d">lavan savava molihe prabhusutā hiḍəpira taya len pasānakan ira</l>
    .</lg>
    . <!-- 3 (d) Q mulihe for molihe -->
    3040<lg n="4">
    .<l n="a">nihan liṅira he vəkaṅku kita pārtha kunaṅ iki ujarku māsku ri kita</l>
    .<l n="b">prasiddha kita śāraṇaṅkva taya len vvaya tiki harimūrtty akarṣaṇa tuvi</l>
    .<l n="c">pahayvakəna teki māsku kinatuṅgalakəna bapa tan dageṅ manah anūt</l>
    .<l n="d">apan sakura nora bheda ṅaraniṅ kadi kita sasavīja hayva malupa</l>
    3045</lg>
    . <!-- 4 (a) L ujarmu (d) Q sakuru for sakura -->
    .<lg n="5">
    .<l n="a">vuvus nr̥pati sārjjavāmr̥ta haturnya maṅinaki saṅ aṅrəṅə̄ rasa nikā</l>
    .<l n="b">tuvin saphala vr̥ddhabhūpati huvus kr̥tasamaya ri sandhiniṅ parahita</l>
    3050<l n="c">siraṅ vinuvusan maṅañjali umastvakəna hayu ni vākya saṅ narapati</l>
    .<l n="d">mahāṅinakakən rəsəp ri manahiṅ bala gaṇa ruməṅə̄ saharṣa mamuji</l>
    .</lg>
    . <!-- 5 (c) S amastvakəna -->
    .</div>
    3055<div type="canto" rend="met" n="47" met="kāmamālā">
    .<note>Creese calls this meter Virat Təbu Sol.</note>
    .<lg n="1">
    .<l n="a">ri huvus nirāṅucap-ucap krama tinuduh ikaṅ balādhikā</l>
    .<l n="b">tumitah tikaṅ pamiḍuḍuk pasaji-saji nikaṅ smarāgama</l>
    3060<l n="c">ri hatur narendraduhitā tikin inayu lavan dhanañjaya</l>
    .<l n="d">śubhakāla rakva sakatambaya ta sira ciniṇḍya de haji</l>
    .</lg>
    .<lg n="2"><l n="a">ya [ta] hetu saṅ yadu kabeh pənuh acatura muṅgu riṅ sabhā</l>
    .<l n="b">mvaṅ ikaṅ balakrama haneṅ nagara sajuru-jurv atiṅkaha</l>
    3065<l n="c">humivə̄ ri kāryya naranātha hasaniga kabeh mapadgata</l>
    .<l n="d">tuvi sāmprayukta vinidāna təkap ikin anindya riṅ haləp</l>
    .</lg>
    . <!-- 2 (a) = LQ (b) S -juru tiṅkaha -->
    .<lg n="3"><l n="a">nda huvus dināhan umaḍaṅ sahana-hana nikaṅ valikrama</l>
    3070<l n="b">kavave pratāpanira saṅ nr̥pati parama viṣṇu kottama</l>
    .<l n="c">ṅuniveh vaṅun-vaṅunaniṅ gr̥ha ri yava təke daləm purī</l>
    .<l n="d">paripūrṇa kapva atisobha paḍa-paḍa minūlya hinyasan</l>
    .</lg>
    . <!-- 3 (b) Q narapati tuhu for nr̥pati parama -->
    3075<lg n="4"><l n="a">asinaṅ pva maṇḍapa nikāhaləp inululan ārjja bhūṣaṇa</l>
    .<l n="b">savave tihaṅnya pinakokiran ikin apadudvaniṅ tulis</l>
    .<l n="c">tuvi vaṅśapatra lumarap palipiran i pagərnya bhāsvara</l>
    .<l n="d">tinulis-tulis ri mayaniṅ tuvu-tuvuhan ikā savaṅ rakət</l>
    .</lg>
    3080 <!-- 4 (a) R maṇḍala for maṇḍapa -->
    .<lg n="5"><l n="a">katəke vuvuṅnyan apənəd pravala cinaturaṅga viḍruma</l>
    .<l n="b">pinapat hivak tinamiṅiṅ jamaṇika paciranya tūt sisi</l>
    .<l n="c">tinatā tikaṅ kanaka jaṅga marakata luməṅhayiṅ tətə̄</l>
    .<l n="d">amirah tikaṅ cavəni simbar ika sinuji luṅsir ujvala</l>
    3085</lg>
    . <!-- 5 (b) S tinamiṅ jamanika ri paciranya -->
    .<lg n="6"><l n="a">tuvi ghūrṇiteṅ nagara varṇa pamarabal ikaṅ payonidhi</l>
    .<l n="b">svaraniṅ mr̥daṅga ṅuniveh paḍahi haji parəṅ magənturan</l>
    .<l n="c">ulahiṅ mahotsava kināryya təkapira ta saṅ vatək yadu</l>
    3090<l n="d">kamənā nirāṅarəpakən pavaraṅira saṅ āryya phalguṇa</l>
    .</lg>
    . <!-- 6 (a) S ghurṇitaṅ; L pamara balik ikaṅ -->
    .<lg n="7"><l n="a">siraṅ ugrasena təlas arppat i yava ṅuniveh vatək ratu</l>
    .<l n="b">karuhun narāryya harimūrtti makajuru lavan halāyudha</l>
    3095<l n="c">irikā narendrasuta pārtha hinarivuvu rāmya riṅ sabhā</l>
    .<l n="d">avuvuh [h]aləpnira savaṅ surapati hinucap ndatan vaneh</l>
    .</lg>
    . <!-- 7 (a) Q yadu for ratu -->
    .<lg n="8"><l n="a">vvaya teki rāmya pavirāmaniṅ atanu hinuttameṅ prabhu</l>
    3100<l n="b">smarasr̥ṣṭhi hīra vaṅunanya rəcəpiṅ aṅajap linaṅvakən</l>
    .<l n="c">kuməñar hatəpnyan abhirū śinaśarudhira vimbaniṅ mirah</l>
    .<l n="d">mayaniṅ vulan laṅi-laṅitnya sinuji kinalacyaniṅ cucur</l>
    .</lg>
    .<lg n="9"><l n="a">nya ta laryya-laryyan ika riṅ pamanisan i surambyaniṅ gr̥ha</l>
    3105<l n="b">ləṅəṅiṅ taladhvaja piniṇḍa vinəḍarakəniṅ labuh kapat</l>
    .<l n="c">ginəlar ta kalpataru puṣpa pakaśaca ri rəṅganiṅ jinəm</l>
    .<l n="d">mrik ikaṅ hasəp lələh aveh turida miṅiṅ arūm nirāntara</l>
    .</lg>
    . <!-- 9 (a) L ikaṅ for ika riṅ -->
    3110<lg n="10"><l n="a">irikā ta rakva pinapak nr̥pavaraduhitā gi*</l></lg>
    . <!-- 10 (a) J lacuna from gi....rāga; R lacuna from (gi)no....smarāga; S inserts: ginorava təkapiṅ para kili paḍa vruh i kagəlaraniṅ pujākrama / valiniṅ smarāgama... -->
    .<lg n="11"><l n="a">............rāgama huvus hinənakəna kabeh sumaṅgraha</l>
    .<l n="b">abhivāda maṅgala paṅarccananira ri harəp nareśvara</l></lg>
    . <!-- (11) (d) L i for ri -->
    3115<lg n="12"><l n="a">nda[h] aneka mukya kinənākəna paṅucaraniṅ valikrama</l>
    .<l n="b">araras tikaṅ paḍahi paṅharivuvunira rāmya len gupit</l>
    .<l n="c">ulahiṅ hanindya tadanāntara pinisaliniṅ vəṅin təkā</l>
    .<l n="d">ndan ahəly avās təkap ikaṅ damar asəmu samūhaniṅ ravi</l></lg>
    . <!-- (12) (a) = LQ; Q hinənakəna -->
    3120<lg n="13"><l n="a">tan ivə̄n masāmpunan ikaṅ pamiḍuḍukan irān mapahyunan</l>
    .<l n="b">riy ulih nirāṅalih i ḍampa kadi salaga karvaban riris</l>
    .<l n="c">panameni gəṇḍiṅ araras ri lakunira lalitya komala</l>
    .<l n="d">kətəbiṅ lumakva kadi karttika siniriṅ i śabdaniṅ patər</l>
    .</lg>
    3125</div>
    .<div type="canto" rend="met" n="48" met="jagaddhita">
    .<lg n="1"><l n="a">muṅgah riṅ gr̥ha ratna nīla pinakoṅgvanira tinavuṅiṅ samāgama</l>
    .<l n="b">mār mrat rūmnya sinaptagopita paragyan ika miṅiṅ arūm kinumkuman</l>
    .<l n="c">mrikniṅ karpura gandhaniṅ jənu-jənunya makatilakaniṅ pasaṅgaman</l>
    3130<l n="d">byaktāmuṅva ri ləṅləṅiṅ manah akuṅ lumaya-laya gatinyan aṅlare</l>
    .</lg>
    . <!-- 1 (a) S smarāgama (c) L kapura -->
    .<lg n="2"><l n="a">ṅkā saṅ pārtha sirātiharṣa maṅisapvakən i sira narendraputrikā</l>
    .<l n="b">təkvan sūkṣma paṅumpətiṅ manasijāṅuyaṅi hati nirān kəneṅ hunəṅ</l>
    3135<l n="c">oyut vetnya hinə̄t kunəṅ [r]yy ulih i saṅ vvaṅ amaraṅ i sirān haneṅ jinəm</l>
    .<l n="d">maṅkin lvir səminiṅ gaḍuṅ paḍa ni kuṅniran amilət i tejaniṅ vulan</l>
    .</lg>
    . <!-- 2 (c) = LQ -->
    .<lg n="3"><l n="a">saṅ hyaṅ-hyaṅniṅ akuṅ prapañca rumaras miṅay agigu məhah minanvakən</l>
    3140<l n="b">śīghrāṅluh sumarambahiṅ mata nirān kadi maluy atəmah madhudrava</l>
    .<l n="c">polahniṅ tikəliṅ halisnira tikin mayat arəṅu kinol nr̥pātmaja</l>
    .<l n="d">rəmpū tvasnira mepu lāgi kinisapvakən alara kavəs vinodanan</l>
    .</lg>
    . <!-- 3 (a) R minvakən, S pinaṅvakən -->
    3145<lg n="4"><l n="a">yekāṅde sivuhən ta saṅ nr̥patiputra rumiṅa-riṅa marmma pet sivi</l>
    .<l n="b">kepvan bhranta savet ni kuṅniran aṅol təṅah alaris amatya-matyakən</l>
    .<l n="c">vetniṅ harṣa nirān kədə̄ kalavanan tvasira karaṇaniṅ harəp-harəp</l>
    .<l n="d">lāgy āvah manisiṅ priyambada pañumbvanira təmahaniṅ karāsikan</l>
    .</lg>
    3150<lg n="5"><l n="a">rakryan saṅ kinəñəp ri nālaniṅ unaṅ saṅ inapi paśarīraniṅ ratih</l>
    .<l n="b">sūkṣmāṅdadya sakeṅ nirātmaka ri ləṅləṅiṅ aṅajap i sandhiniṅ laṅə̄</l>
    .<l n="c">pāvakniṅ madhu saṅ hyaṅiṅ kusuma lakṣminiṅ asana maṇikniṅ aṅdyahi</l>
    .<l n="d">śrīniṅ karttika mūrttiniṅ prathima ratna kari kita madadya putrikā</l>
    .</lg>
    3155 <!-- 5 (b) Liṅ ajap -->
    .<lg n="6"><l n="a">maṅke pvāri katon pralabdha hiḍəp i ṅvaṅ aṅisapu marək mare kita</l>
    .<l n="b">saṅ tan sah [h]inajap kunəṅ karaṇaniṅ ḍatəṅ i kita mənen pamaṅkvakən</l>
    .<l n="c">saṅ sākṣāt maṇikiṅ hiḍəp pinakahəmbanan i tələṅiṅ aṅgəgə̄ smara</l>
    .<l n="d">donkvālābha ri siddhaniṅ bhaṣama sātmaka katəkan amuktya sanmata</l>
    3160</lg>
    . <!-- 6 (a) Riṅ ṅvaṅ (b) = Q -->
    .<lg n="7"><l n="a">epū ṅvaṅ mapa kālaniṅ pinuvakan vulat anahəli kuṅnya tan lutur</l>
    .<l n="b">ndak ton kiṅkiṅ ikāməgəṅ turida yadyapi kaluputaniṅ priyambada</l>
    .<l n="c">byaktān māntəna jīvitanyan apuput pati kasarik i ratnaniṅ purī</l>
    3165<l n="d">maṅgəh prastutiniṅ rarasta pakamuṣṭiniṅ aṅaraṅ aṅel kəneṅ riris</l>
    .</lg>
    .<lg n="8"><l n="a">nāhan cumbva narendraputra mamanis lvir aṅətəri hilik suputrikā</l>
    .<l n="b">mambə̄ satpada matta maṅrəṅih i paṅjrahiṅ asana miṅiṅ turuṅ məkar</l>
    .<l n="c">pet-pet harṣa manambyakən vuvus arūm təhər aṅarəki kədv aṅolakən</l>
    3170<l n="d">eñjuh yan paṅalap kasor ləkas irāṅiliṅ-iliṅi mahāṅgagap təṅah</l>
    .</lg>
    . <!-- 8 (a) L cumbvana (d) S maṅalap -->
    .</div>
    .<div type="canto" rend="met" n="49" met="kilayu-anəḍəṅ">
    3175<lg n="1"><l n="a">ndan śrī nr̥pavaraduhitā miṅe ri manisiṅ vuvus aṅari-hari</l>
    .<l n="b">tapvan gərəmə ri rəcəpiṅ prahāsana narendratanaya maṅamər</l>
    .<l n="c">ardhāgigu vinisikakən humiṅsər anaṅis tikin inarəkana</l>
    .<l n="d">mogākiput avəḍi yadin kacidra paduniṅ tapih iniṅətakən</l>
    .</lg>
    3180 <!-- 1 (a) S omits miṅe (b) L prahasanā -->
    .<lg n="2"><l n="a">təkvan rəṅu-rəṅu ni liriṅ nirārəja ñəñərnya hamiṣani ṅ akuṅ</l>
    .<l n="b">lāvan tikəl i halis irāṅani tvas amaṅun lələhiṅ aṅaməra</l>
    .<l n="c">lāvan panulakira kadi pva sinvamiṅ aśoka kasiririṅ aṅin</l>
    .<l n="d">himpər sarasija kinudaṅ nikaṅ bhramara matta cala-cala nira</l>
    3185</lg>
    . <!-- 2 (a) Q amisani kuṅ (b) S nirā- -->
    .<lg n="3"><l n="a">āmbək nr̥pasuta kataləh kəneṅ manis i rūm nr̥pavaraduhitā</l>
    .<l n="b">maṅkin raga-ragan aṅamər sirāṅusapi gātra lagi palə-paləh</l>
    .<l n="c">lāvan taṅanira tumameṅ təṅah marək i puṇḍutan inarəpakən</l>
    3190<l n="d">sanyāsa maṅuvahi ri kapriyambadan irāṅucap amahi laṅə̄</l>
    .</lg>
    .<lg n="4"><l n="a">rakryan saṅ inapi maṇikiṅ kalaṅvan anusah tvasiṅ alara makuṅ</l>
    .<l n="b">dentāṅrahatakəna manis-manista ləvu denya sumusuk i hati </l>
    .<l n="c">sa[ṅ] nitya cumarik i laṅə̄ṅku lot makaparantyaniṅ añulu-ñuluh</l>
    3195<l n="d">himpər śaśadhara juga tan panīsi kucupiṅ salaga kapanasan</l>
    .</lg>
    . <!-- 4 (b) L dontā- for dentā- (c) = LQ; S sumarik (d) L panisi -->
    .<lg n="5"><l n="a">saṅ kady asana kusuma rūmta muṅgv i vahəliṅ patah arəja miṅiṅ</l>
    .<l n="b">rāmyāṅiṅin-iṅin amaṅun hunəṅ juga rarasta bisama kinəmit</l>
    3200<l n="c">ṅvaṅ satpada lalita maṅel aṅə̄lvakəna rāga turida malavas</l>
    .<l n="d">tañ jrih maṅarəki suka mātya yan huvus acihna hamuṅari gəluṅ</l>
    .</lg>
    . <!-- 5 (a) Liṅ for i -->
    .</div>
    3205<div type="canto" rend="met" n="50" met="jagaddhita">
    .<lg n="1"><l n="a">hāh ndin koluyaniṅ laṅə̄ ṅvaṅ iki denya mucapakəna sotaniṅ rimaṅ</l>
    .<l n="b">dūran yan hana mātra kampirakəneṅ kətə-kətəg ikan amriyambada</l>
    .<l n="c">simbantən ṅvaṅ atə̄n ri denyan aməkul təṅah ahuyaṅ aminta sanmata</l>
    .<l n="d">vāliṅnyan kakənan karāsikan inambvakəna kalaraniṅ kəneṅ hunəṅ</l>
    3210</lg>
    .<lg n="2"><l n="a">lāvan toh paṅamāknya ləṅləṅ inaveśa kapuritən i paṅdaniṅ smara</l>
    .<l n="b">bhrantajñāna kapəñciriṅ jariji len vətis anuji hunəṅnya mohita</l>
    .<l n="c">epū tvasnya karəṅrəṅan kasarikiṅ gəluṅ alara kəneṅ matāmanis</l>
    .<l n="d">tan vriṅ rāt kapanan ginocara pameny amapaka rika liṅnya lampunən</l>
    3215</lg>
    . <!-- 2 (b) Q kapəñcər -->
    .<lg n="3"><l n="a">nā liṅ śrī nr̥paputrikālara sineva lagi vinuvusan nr̥pātmaja</l>
    .<l n="b">māskv induṅ tarimanta pamrihiṅ amaṅkvakən i kita hamaṅhya-maṅhyakən</l>
    .<l n="c">yadyastun hinilanta riṅ smita təhər cacahakən ta yeṅ nakāluṅid</l>
    3220<l n="d">mon mātyāku sapadya yan kalavanan bhaṣamaniṅ aṅusir smarālaya</l>
    .</lg>
    . <!-- 3 (b) S amanḍya-manḍyakəna -->
    .<lg n="4"><l n="a">saṅsiptanya dələ̄nta sotaniṅ akuṅ tikin amarəkakən priyambada</l>
    .<l n="b">sāhityān paṅajap sihanta pamavan lara turida minuṣṭi tan bəsur</l>
    3225<l n="c">māntən tan katəkān prayojana marambataniṅ ahayu ratnakanyakā</l>
    .<l n="d">aṅhiṅ ganya hinūrnya tan maliha keraṅ i manah ika tan sinanmatan</l>
    .</lg>
    . <!-- 4 (d) LQ ṅganya -->
    .</div>
    3230<div type="canto" rend="met" n="51" met="aśvalalita">
    .<lg n="1"><l n="a">liṅira narendraputra sira saṅ narendraduhitāṅəsah kaparihan</l>
    .<l n="b">gupay anukər sirātulak i paṅrəmihnira ta saṅ narendratanaya</l>
    .<l n="c">viphala pupug tikaṅ kuku nahan pamādhaka nirāla[h] arddha kabalik</l>
    .<l n="d">yaya tan avəh ləkas nr̥patiputra maṅkin ataləh-taləh maṅarəki</l>
    3235</lg>
    . <!-- 1 (b) Q paṅrəṅih; Sira (c) S pamanḍakan; = LQ -->
    .<lg n="2"><l n="a">nr̥paduhitāti kepvan atahər ndatan pajamuga ṅ tvas epv aṅəsəsan</l>
    .<l n="b">tuhu nikanaṅ taṅisnira ya teki rakva paṅavə̄r nire nr̥pasuta</l>
    .<l n="c">kalalu ya tan hiniṣṭi panəpak nirālah alisuh ndatan paṅupama</l>
    3240<l n="d">nr̥pasuta maṅkin aṅhudanakən prahāsananira lvir ārṇava madhu</l>
    .</lg>
    .</div>
    .<div type="canto" rend="met" n="52" met="jagaddhita">
    .<lg n="1"><l n="a">dyah [h]iṣṭaṅkv ibu puṇya denta pamatanta tan arəṅu miṅe tumiṅhala</l>
    3245<l n="b">heman tebu rirista tan paṅuniṅeṅ alara turida kokalan lulut</l>
    .<l n="c">tan luh tan paṅəsah lavan prihati hetuniṅ akalib aseva tan liniṅ</l>
    .<l n="d">hīṅanyan kapanan vival ṅvaṅ ikin amrih anəkən avilāśaniṅ marək</l>
    .</lg>
    .<lg n="2"><l n="a">kenaknyān ḍavuhən manista ta kari ṅ sinavava riṅ akuṅ ndatan cala</l>
    3250<l n="b">āpan vyarttha rəṅihta hetuniṅ aṅel cala-cala riṅ apan kasiṅgihan</l>
    .<l n="c">siṅgih yan panəpak jajāṅayatakən kuku bisama hamə̄m vajāmirah</l>
    .<l n="d">nistanyan pinalalvakən* ḍatəṅ i māsku patayaśa ni paṅhyaṅ i ṅhulun</l>
    .</lg>
    . <!-- 2 (a) = LQ (d) Q omits n; LQ pinalayvakən -->
    3255<lg n="3"><l n="a">nāhan byakta ni kuṅ saṅ arjjuna madadyana vacana hanorakəñ juruh</l>
    .<l n="b">kədv āmbəknira tan kumə̄lakən unəṅ rinəṅihanira lot sinikvakən</l>
    .<l n="c">ndan saṅ śrī nr̥paputrikāgəyuh alə̄k lalu viphala taṅis nirātulak</l>
    .<l n="d">tan vriṅ dāya sirān kinevala makin linuruṅ i paləkas nr̥pātmaja</l>
    .</lg>
    3260 <!-- 3 (a) Q manorakən (b) L kuməlakən (c) Q ndah (d) Q deya; R liniruṅ -->
    .<lg n="4"><l n="a">byātītan panukər narendraduhitāṅəlih alara kacidra riṅ gati</l>
    .<l n="b">sahniṅ siñjaṅ irān miṅiṅ ndan aməḍar təṅah añuriga rosnya komala</l>
    .<l n="c">maṅkin tvasnira saṅ dhanañjaya girahyasən i paṅavatiṅ smare sira</l>
    .<l n="d">lvir kumbaṅ vahu kāñaran təkap i rūm-rūmiṅ asana baśānəsəp madhu</l>
    3265</lg>
    . <!-- 4 (d) S anəcəp -->
    .</div>
    .<div type="canto" rend="met" n="53" met="mālinī">
    .<lg n="1">
    3270<l n="a">ri huvusira pinurvāṅlih lume śrī suputrī</l>
    .<l n="b">nr̥patanaya manambut mār mrata tvas nirônəṅ</l>
    .<l n="c">saṅ ahayu sira sākṣāt raśminiṅ padma rukṣa</l>
    .<l n="d">cinulu-culuhiṅ ojar de nirāṅrəs maṅuṇḍəṅ</l>
    .</lg>
    3275 <!-- 1 (b) Q mrat ta -->
    .<lg n="2">
    .<l n="a">nr̥pasuta sira maṅkin tibra de śrī suputrī</l>
    .<l n="b">kavuvuhan i kəñarniṅ <app><lem vit="#edc #msL">ḍīpa</lem><rdg vit="#msK">ḍipa</rdg></app> moləm ndatan krām</l>
    .<l n="c">makin asəmu tulis mās de nirāṅlih tar olah</l>
    3280<l n="d">nr̥pasuta tatan aśrv āṅol amaṅkvāṅajum ken</l>
    .</lg>
    . <!-- 2 (b) = L, K ḍipa -->
    .<lg n="3"><l n="a">kunəṅ iki nr̥paputrī śoka moruk lumuṅsur</l>
    .<l n="b">tuvin agila təkapniṅ siñjaṅ amləs karāhan</l>
    3285<l n="c">krama umijil inəmban saṅ priyāsih tan imbā</l>
    .<l n="d">kamənanira sinocan riṅ surambyan cumuntən</l>
    .</lg>
    . <!-- 3 (b) S umələs -->
    .<lg n="4"><l n="a">kaka-kakanira tan doh kapva sāmpun sənāha</l>
    3290<l n="b">humənakən aḍamu vruh rīṅgitājñān patiṅkah</l>
    .<l n="c">paḍa-paḍa vinagəd riṅ lālanātyanta pattya</l>
    .<l n="d">avicarita sinocan devi tar sah makarvan</l>
    .</lg>
    .<lg n="5"><l n="a">huvus aḍamu ta kālih saṅ səḍəṅ vāhv apaṅgih</l>
    3295<l n="b">pinuyu-puyur iniryyan-hiryyaniṅ ceṭikāsih</l>
    .<l n="c">rari palaluniṅ āmbək kə̄lakən duhka mātra</l>
    .<l n="d">apan iki lara rakryan ndan ya malvī lulut tvas</l>
    .</lg>
    . <!-- 5 (d) Q maluy for malvī -->
    3300<lg n="6"><l n="a">kusuma sarasija mrik mvaṅ mənūr nāgapuṣpa</l>
    .<l n="b">mapa kari paṅadeśanya ndatan len ya yogya</l>
    .<l n="c">viniru-viru təkapniṅ kumbaṅ onəṅ viśīrṇa</l>
    .<l n="d">taham ibu panahāṅkve māsku nāhan patəmva</l>
    .</lg>
    3305<lg n="7"><l n="a">maluya rari usə̄n riṅ veśma tāntuk haram dyah</l>
    .<l n="b">ahəla-həla saṅ onəṅ mogha hāmhām sirāṅher</l>
    .<l n="c">nahan ujar ika masvī ndan haneraṅ suputrī</l>
    .<l n="d">krama hinamər umantuk riṅ jinəm mrik [h]umuṅgah</l>
    .</lg>
    3310 <!-- 7 (c) L taneraṅ -->
    .<lg n="8"><l n="a">riy ulihira suputrī ryy āntaniṅ veśma rāmya</l>
    .<l n="b">nr̥pasuta sira maṅkin harṣa yekāṅisapvan</l>
    .<l n="c">aṅupuk-upuk amāsvās nā ṅ mukālurva moləm</l>
    .<l n="d">təhər aṅaras avantə̄ rūmniṅ ojar savaṅ truh</l>
    3315</lg>
    .</div>
    .<div type="canto" rend="met" n="54" met="jagaddhita">
    .<lg n="1"><l n="a">saṅ sākṣāt kadaṅiṅ vulan saṅ apatər turida saṅ ariris-riris laṅə̄</l>
    .<l n="b">saṅ nityāṅdani kiṅkiṅ i ṅvaṅ asəvə̄ hunaṅ athava lulutkv asinvama</l>
    3320<l n="c">marmāṅol i raras-rarasta sahajāmvatakəna səkariṅ karāsikan</l>
    .<l n="d">tan vriṅ rāt ri sukaṅkva yan kalavanan pavilətana ri tatvaniṅ gati</l>
    .</lg>
    . <!-- 1 (b) L omits i (d) L riṅ for vriṅ -->
    .<lg n="2"><l n="a">maṅke pveki dələ̄n harebu sipi bhāgyaniṅ aṅajəṅ (ṅ)acatva cumbana</l>
    3325<l n="b">rūmtenduṅ pinakāntya jīvita siluṅluṅiṅ anəmu sayodya riṅ prəman</l>
    .<l n="c">maṅgəh nitya sinandhi riṅ mata tamolah aṅañuta ri kiṅkiṅ i ṅhulun</l>
    .<l n="d">ndan yan mātya manəhta sātmya ri manista ḍavuhən irikaṅ tasik madhu</l>
    .</lg>
    . <!-- 2 (a) L ta rebu; = LQ -->
    3330</div>
    .<div type="canto" rend="met" n="55" met="kāmamālā">
    .<note>Creese calls this meter Virat Təbu Sol.</note>
    .<lg n="1">
    .<l n="a">iti nā ta lālana nirāṅlipurakən i narendraputrikā</l>
    3335<l n="b">araras manaṅhulu maveh səpah arəja mahānəsəp laṭi</l>
    .<l n="c">təhər aṅririh-ririhi romanira tama hamatya-matyani</l>
    .<l n="d">amasaṅ-masaṅ ndatan aləh mayat i gəmuh ikaṅ payodhara</l>
    .</lg>
    . <!-- 1 (a) L -putrīkā (b) S saha for mahā (c) L nirā (d) R ndan ataləh, S nda ataləh for ndatan aləh -->
    3340<lg n="2">
    .<l n="a">ahirit sinambaṅan ireṅ kakavin asəmu mombakan laṅə̄</l>
    .<l n="b">sinəlan-səlān ri rəsəpiṅ maṅarəki pipi rāmya meñjuha</l>
    .<l n="c">ri pamāhva-māhvan i manis ni culu-culuh irāmriyambada</l>
    .<l n="d">anusah mayaṅ vahu məkar ndan amanəhi rinəṅva-rəṅvakən</l>
    3345</lg>
    . <!-- 2 (a) S iraṅ -->
    .<lg n="3"><l n="a">papupul nr̥pātmaja lavan nr̥pavaraduhitā haneṅ jinəm</l>
    .<l n="b">maṅunəṅ mənur paḍaniran katirah aṅarasiṅ vəlas-harəp</l>
    .<l n="c">alaṅə̄ hatur ləṅəṅ ikaṅ gaḍuṅ avilət arok vanañjari</l>
    3350<l n="d">nda nahan patūtnira tikin prasama-sama tinuṅgaliṅ laṅə̄</l>
    .</lg>
    . <!-- 3 (d) Q ndan; Q panut -->
    .<lg n="4"><l n="a">nr̥paputra rāmya ri daləm śayana kumavaśe* karāsikan</l>
    .<l n="b">sakuləm sirārddha tan arip lalu paṅamər ire suputrikā</l>
    3355<l n="c">karəṅə̄ prahāsana nireka təkapiṅ anaviṅ lavan rəṅih</l>
    .<l n="d">saha nopurāsriṅ atakis marahakəna panandhiniṅ gati</l>
    .</lg>
    . <!-- 4 (a) LQ kumavaśeṅ -->
    .</div>
    3360<div type="canto" rend="met" n="56" met="navaharṣa">
    .<lg n="1"><l n="a">kalalu ṅ vəṅi tan dva rahina mava tejaniṅ ārkka lumə̄ṅ</l>
    .<l n="b">irikā ta ḍatəṅ krabanira sahananya huvus marəpat </l>
    .<l n="c">paḍa tānupamāparimita kadi saṅka riṅ indrapada</l>
    .<l n="d">viniśeṣa təkap narapati harimūrtti makon tumatā</l>
    3365</lg>
    .<lg n="2"><l n="a">vara saptakumārika tuvi mr̥ganābhi sugandha sumār</l>
    .<l n="b">ya mamuṅva laṅənya ri sira saṅ amūrvva haneṅ śayana</l>
    .<l n="c">mvaṅ ikāṅ asəp aṅrahagi sahaja subnya təkāṅləṅəṅi</l>
    .<l n="d">amapag rarasiṅ cavəni jamaṇikanya miṅiṅ tan arən</l>
    3370</lg>
    . <!-- 2 (c) L ikaṅ -->
    .<lg n="3"><l n="a">gupit ārjja lavan kiduṅ ika hanameni parəṅ haṅavat</l>
    .<l n="b">kahiḍəp ləṅəṅiṅ madhumasa ri haturnya savaṅ bhramara</l>
    .<l n="c">svaṅ aṅimbuhi raśmi tan ari pasajinyan amuṅ salulut</l>
    3375<l n="d">aṅaveśa ri rəsniran anavuṅ unəṅ sagavenya marūm</l>
    .</lg>
    .<lg n="4"><l n="a">ndah avāsira saṅ rva tumama ri surambyaniran <hi rend="superscript">†</hi>majajar</l>
    .<l n="b">krama sāmpun asoca maṅənakəna bhūṣaṇa pahyas ira</l>
    .<l n="c">anavuṅ haləpiṅ sarasija sinavaṅ madhu rūpa nira</l>
    3380<l n="d">sinaran hana<hi rend="superscript">†</hi>niṅ kaka-kaka sararasnyan amaṇḍaga sə̄k</l>
    .</lg>
    . <!-- 4 (a) LQ avās sira; S ajajar -->
    .<lg n="5">
    .<l n="a">vəkasan vvaya <foreign>tāmvaṅ</foreign>ira tinuha riṅ pura somya tuvi</l>
    3385<l n="b">viniveka sulakṣaṇa maṅarahakən ri sirān mijila</l>
    .<l n="c">irikā sira saṅ rva tumuluy aṅadəg mijileṅ pasabhān</l>
    .<l n="d">paripūrṇa ta saṅ yadukula hinivə̄ manaḍah ri yava</l>
    .</lg>
    . <!-- 5 (a) Q hana ta for vvaya ta; MSS tamvaṅ; S para for pura -->
    3390<lg n="6"><l n="a">adavān mara tiṅkahira kunəṅ i liṅsir ikaṅ divasa</l>
    .<l n="b">umulih sira saṅ rva maṅalihi haneṅ gr̥ha rāmya sira</l>
    .<l n="c">anamar ləṅəṅiṅ hasana kusuma rakva lavan bhramara</l>
    .<l n="d">aṅamər juga maṅrəbu-rəbu maṅudaṅ rahatiṅ salulut</l>
    .</lg>
    3395<lg n="7"><l n="a">ndan arən rəṅu saṅ nr̥pavaraduhitāsih irān pasəvə̄</l>
    .<l n="b">ri savet ni manis nr̥pasuta malapi tvas irān masuma</l>
    .<l n="c">kadi marmma nikaṅ gaḍiṅ amarəkakən rarabiṅ jalada</l>
    .<l n="d">ruməsəp sumusuk lulutira mapisan ri narendrasuta</l>
    .</lg>
    3400 <!-- 7 (d) Snira -->
    .<lg n="8"><l n="a">nr̥paputra samaṅkana papupul ireka mahāmirati</l>
    .<l n="b">ri kaśaktan i kuṅnira pinahayu denira riṅ śayana</l>
    .<l n="c">luruniṅ liriṅ omanira pasagi laipana susva tənəṅ</l>
    .<l n="d">paṅamər pinakārcana putus i sanidhya nirān saharas</l>
    3405</lg>
    .<lg n="9"><l n="a">sumilih tikanaṅ surasa ya ta bhinukti nirān sumaji</l>
    .<l n="b">mvaṅ ikāṅ upabhoga ataca paribhoga taya ṅ kahala</l>
    .<l n="c">vara sarvva viśeṣa hinabhimata denira kapva hana</l>
    .<l n="d">apan uttama vīryya haji sakala pāvakiṅ āṣṭaguṇa</l>
    3410</lg>
    .</div>
    .<div type="canto" rend="met" n="57" met="praharṣiṇī">
    .<lg n="1"><l n="a">ndah yan maṅkana papupul nirātirāmya</l>
    .<l n="b">tan varsih samanah irāhurup lulut kuṅ</l>
    3415<l n="c">luṅhā ṅ lek ata malavas [h]ulah nirātūt</l>
    .<l n="d">solur harṣa ta masəvə̄ hunəṅ nirābvat</l>
    .</lg>
    .<lg n="2"><l n="a">saṅsiptan patəmunira ndatan vivākṣan</l>
    .<l n="b">prāptā ṅ dvādaśa tikanaṅ tahun linakvan</l>
    3420<l n="c">de saṅ phalguṇa matutur sire samaṅkā</l>
    .<l n="d">an saṅ kāri mapa kunəṅ mənen kavuntat</l>
    .</lg>
    . <!-- 2 (b) S prapteṅ (c) L maṅkā for samaṅkā -->
    .<lg n="3"><l n="a">jātīniṅ dadi tamatan vənaṅ viyoga</l>
    3425<l n="b">tr̥ṣṇāgə̄ṅ ya ta marumah malit rikaṅ tvas</l>
    .<l n="c">yekāṅde lara baribin kaveśa denya</l>
    .<l n="d">moghān vismr̥ti ya pavehnya bhāvacakra</l>
    .</lg>
    . <!-- 3 (d) Q moga vismr̥ti -->
    3430<lg n="4"><l n="a">ṅkā rakvān paṅadəhakən ri buddhi pārtha</l>
    .<l n="b">hetunyan mavara-varah sire saṅ antən</l>
    .<l n="c">māskv induṅ kita rari jīvitaṅkva sākṣāt</l>
    .<l n="d">kiṅkiṅkv ību pahalilaṅ ta māryya śoka</l>
    .</lg>
    3435<lg n="5"><l n="a">maṅke pvāḍr̥dha manamantareṅ svacitta</l>
    .<l n="b">gə̄ṅniṅ bhaktiniṅ ayayah lavan kakāsih</l>
    .<l n="c">saṅkā yan [h]ati malavas sirān tinambaṅ</l>
    .<l n="d">ndah kāṅən mapa ta vəkas nireṅ kaḍatvan</l>
    .</lg>
    3440 <!-- 5 (c) Q saṅke; = LQ -->
    .<lg n="6"><l n="a">ṅhiṅ rakryan panuluya bhakti ni ṅhulun dyah</l>
    .<l n="b">sihtāṅālihana umilva riṅ svadeśa</l>
    .<l n="c">rīndrapraṣṭha pahalavə̄n humer kitāntən</l>
    .<l n="d">kesyan taṅ manah anulus svadharmma rakryan</l>
    3445</lg>
    .<lg n="7"><l n="a">ndah yekin patayaśa saṅhulun harebu</l>
    .<l n="b">prah-prahkv ānivi ri ləbū ni jə̄ṅ narendra</l>
    .<l n="c">tan len māskv ibu duluraṅkva satyabhakti</l>
    .<l n="d">ṅkā rakryan pamahayu seccha dharmmaputra</l>
    3450</lg>
    . <!-- 7 (a) L arebu (c) L ību -->
    .<lg n="8"><l n="a">nā liṅ saṅ nr̥patanayāṅamər manantva</l>
    .<l n="b">ṅkā devī sira sumahur vuvus nirāsrət</l>
    .<l n="c">svāmi vruhku bapa hiḍəpta sādhu yogya</l>
    3455<l n="d">ndi ṅvaṅ tan tumuta purih nikaṅ manivya</l>
    .</lg>
    . <!-- 8 (c) Q omits bapa -->
    .<lg n="9"><l n="a">aṅhiṅ mohita tumukəl laraṅkva monəṅ</l>
    .<l n="b">ṅkāneṅ raiṇa muvah i saṅ nariśvarāgə̄ṅ</l>
    3460<l n="c">kintu pva ṅ sanak aṅave hunəṅ ya maṅhrət</l>
    .<l n="d">lud tapvan mamaləs asih vaśāṅlare tvas</l>
    .</lg>
    .<lg n="10"><l n="a">bhaktiṅkv ī bapa bibi ta pva tan vivākṣan</l>
    .<l n="b">sākṣāt parvvata himavān lavan sumeru</l>
    3465<l n="c">sih-sihkv ī kita yadiyan hivə̄n vinarṇa</l>
    .<l n="d">sākṣāt sāgara paramādhikāra riṅ lvā</l>
    .</lg>
    . <!-- 10 (a) S omits ta pva (c) L yadyan -->
    .<lg n="11"><l n="a">tan varṇan paṅucap-ucap nirāta kālih</l>
    3470<l n="b">sāmpun māyu pasamayan narendraputra</l>
    .<l n="c">ratry āmrəm ta sira sarāmyaniṅ jinəm mrik</l>
    .<l n="d">tamtam tvasnira manavuṅ hunəṅ sarāga</l>
    .</lg>
    . <!-- 11 (a) S yan for tan -->
    3475</div>
    .<div type="canto" rend="met" n="58" met="jagaddhita">
    .<lg n="1"><l n="a">eñjiṅ saṅ nr̥paputra karva kalulutnira mavuṅu mijil sakeṅ jinəm</l>
    .<l n="b">ndah yekān tumuluy mareṅ makara rāmya sira tiki parəṅ macāmana</l>
    .<l n="c">ṅkān məntas sira kālihiṅ bañu silih tusapi muka paḍəmvaniṅ mata</l>
    3480<l n="d"><hi rend="superscript">†</hi>lāgy āhyas tumatā patah mrik anəcək-nəcəki sira narendraputrikā</l>
    .</lg>
    .<lg n="2"><l n="a">sāmpun mayvan atūt parəṅ mijil<hi rend="superscript">† </hi>atuntunan aṅalihi de nirān laku</l>
    .<l n="b">mambə̄ manmatha saṅ hyaṅiṅ śayana muṅgv i pamatanira len vajāmanis</l>
    .<l n="c">ṅkāne tumpyaṭakiṅ surambyan irikā sira parəṅ aśilātitih pupū</l>
    3485<l n="d">hyaṅniṅ rāsika rakva liṅniṅ umulat ri paṅisapu nirān maveh səpah</l>
    .</lg>
    . <!-- 2 (d) R inserts (lagya hyas tumata patah mrik) after pupu -->
    .<lg n="3"><l n="a">yak mātyāku mapeki rāmya nika yapvan umaluya mareṅ madhubrata</l>
    .<l n="b">eñjuh tan sah amuktya rūmta yan adadya riṅ asana miṅiṅ haneṅ taman</l>
    3490<l n="c">ləṅləṅkun yadiyan kavantus irikaṅ gaḍiṅ aṅani linañcaran madhu</l>
    .<l n="d">svarggān mātya sinambyakəñ juga lamun təlas aciri sukaṅkv añumbana</l>
    .</lg>
    . <!-- 3 (d) S sinambvakən; L añumbani -->
    .<lg n="4"><l n="a">nāhan denira pārtha mojar amanis sinamakəna pamiṇḍaniṅ kilaṅ</l>
    3495<l n="b">harṣātə̄n aṅəluk-həluk jariji aṣṭanira təhər ajambatan təṅah</l>
    .<l n="c">jaṅgāṅol larisiṅ pupus gaḍiṅ ulahnira lalita sumiṅhiteṅ kapə̄</l>
    .<l n="d">ṅhiṅ devī miṅay aṅrəṅih lagi luməṅhay inarəkan i saṅ nr̥pātmaja</l>
    .</lg>
    .<lg n="5"><l n="a">tan varṇan savilāśa saṅ rva vəkasan sira mijil adulur mare daləm</l>
    3500<l n="b">ṅkāne jə̄ṅnira saṅ narendra basudeva hana sira lavan halāyudha</l>
    .<l n="c">mvaṅ saṅ śrī naranātha keśava ḍatəṅ nr̥pasuta ṅuniveh suputrikā</l>
    .<l n="d">kapvāṇamya ri jə̄ṅ narādhipa kataṅgama ta sira ri saṅ dhanañjaya</l>
    .</lg>
    . <!-- 5 (c) S krəṣṇa ri for keśava -->
    3505<lg n="6"><l n="a">səmbah saṅ nr̥paputra sajña naranātha huniṅan iki paṅhyaṅ i ṅhulun</l>
    .<l n="b">amvīt mantuka tekihən manə-manəhta narapati* humusap ri jə̄ṅ haji</l>
    .<l n="c">maṅgəh tan hiḍəpan kr̥taghna makalis humilaṅakəna puṇya saṅ prabhu</l>
    .<l n="d">kady ādharmma ri denya sis bisama saṅ kaluputana sakeṅ prabandhana</l>
    .</lg>
    3510 <!-- 6 (a) Qniṅ for saṅ (b) L amvit (d) S hidəpnya for ri denya -->
    .<lg n="7"><l n="a">sāmpunyan pamuhun dhanañjaya kinolakəna sira təkap nareśvara</l>
    .<l n="b">bhoh rakryan vihikan ṅhulun bapa manahta taya cala gatinya don mami</l>
    .<l n="c">yadyastun kavəkas kitān təhər aparvakəna nagara bhūmi punpunan</l>
    .<l n="d">mvaṅ tekaṅ vara rājayogya sahaneṅ nagara kita mamuktya rumpvana</l>
    3515</lg>
    .<lg n="8"><l n="a">maṅgəh pvāntusakənta māsku mulateṅ kaviguṇaniṅ anātha kāsyasih</l>
    .<l n="b">hayvevəh vinuruk nda hayva pinaləh tan alalisa ri sihta nistura</l>
    .<l n="c">prihtenduṅ nyata dharmmaniṅ kadi kitānivi lavan ayayah pahayvana</l>
    .<l n="d">mvaṅ penāgraja yeka kavruhana sihnira katuturakən giṇāraray</l>
    3520</lg>
    . <!-- 8 (c) Q kitāvini -->
    .<lg n="9"><l n="a">ndah maṅkā pitutur nirāmr̥ta hiḍəp nr̥patanaya təhər <foreign>kr̥tāñjali</foreign></l>
    .<l n="b">ṅkā śrī kr̥ṣṇa sirāvuvus tumuture sira muliha savet nirālulut</l>
    .<l n="c">maṅkā śrī baladeva nora kavəkas manahira tumute nr̥pātmaja</l>
    3525<l n="d">ṅhiṅ maṅgəh tak asuṅ narendrasuta liṅnira niyata hələm sirāṅlavad</l>
    .</lg>
    . <!-- 9 (a) MSS kr̥tañjali (d) L ya ta for niyata -->
    .</div>
    .<div type="canto" rend="met" n="59" met="bhramaravilasita">
    3530<lg n="1"><l n="a">byātītan lvirniran aṅucap-ucap</l>
    .<l n="b">luṅhā ṅ dūtāmava vacana haji</l>
    .<l n="c">ri śrī dharmātmaja yugala nira</l>
    .<l n="d">rājyendrapraṣṭha ya ta paran ikā</l>
    .</lg>
    3535<lg n="2"><l n="a">ryy āṅkatniṅ bhr̥tya haji tan ucapən</l>
    .<l n="b">tiṅkah saṅ pārtha ta sira valuyan</l>
    .<l n="c">mantuk ri sthānanira ta ri daləm</l>
    .<l n="d">akveh taṅ vr̥ṣṇikula lumavada</l>
    .</lg>
    3540<lg n="3"><l n="a">enak pāvvat niki marək i sira</l>
    .<l n="b">kapvāṅluh denya paḍa kamasihən</l>
    .<l n="c">jātī tr̥ṣṇāṅavaśa manaputi</l>
    .<l n="d">kāṅən sihnye nr̥pavaraduhitā</l>
    .</lg>
    3545 <!-- 3 (a) L pāvat -->
    .<lg n="4"><l n="a">ndan devy āmbəknira pinitaṅisan</l>
    .<l n="b">mogāṅluh nālanira kavəlasən</l>
    .<l n="c">glānāṅaṇḍəh sira mayat apasah</l>
    .<l n="d">tan vriṅ kvān riṅ kṣaṇa siran asəkəl</l>
    3550</lg>
    . <!-- 4 (d) Q anəsəl for asəkəl -->
    .</div>
    .<div type="canto" rend="met" n="60" met="śārdūlavikrīḍita">
    .<lg n="1"><l n="a">vvaṅ riṅ rājya parəṅ madandan umivə̄ vyāpāra muṅgviṅ daləm</l>
    3555<l n="b">evə̄r <foreign>denya</foreign> samāṅarəp madadakan kapvāsipət vruh kabeh</l>
    .<l n="c">tan vāktan tikanaṅ tumūt mara riṅ indrapraṣṭha magyā parəṅ</l>
    .<l n="d">somah kapva humuṅ gatinya sakuləm mvaṅ hyas tinūnye hati</l>
    .</lg>
    . <!-- 1 (b) MSS denyā -->
    3560</div>
    .<div type="canto" rend="met" n="61" met="śikhariṇī">
    .<lg n="1"><l n="a">vivākṣan riṅ heñjiṅ śubhadivasa taṅ deśa vimala</l>
    .<l n="b">lumampah pārtha mvaṅ kalulutira māmvīt sira huvus</l>
    .<l n="c">parəṅ muṅgah muṅgviṅ ratha siran akarvan vinulatan</l>
    3565<l n="d">təlas rabdha mvaṅ dāruki lariniran rāmya mahaləp</l>
    .</lg>
    . <!-- 2 (a) S pamarakṣa (c) S omitsniṅ -->
    .<lg n="2"><l n="a">samāpta pvekaṅ vr̥ṣṇi bala pamarākṣe lakunira </l>
    .<l n="b">vavaṅ luṅhā saṅkeṅ nagara lariniṅ syandana huvus</l>
    3570<l n="c">manahniṅ kāryy āśā paḍa kamadələ̄n lot hali-halin</l>
    .<l n="d">maṅə̄ monəṅ cittanya kadi təhər āṅlimbaṅāṅiriṅ</l>
    .</lg>
    .<lg n="3"><l n="a">ndan akveh kiṅkiṅnya nda tucapa ta saṅ paṇḍutanaya</l>
    .<l n="b">makin mintar lampahnira atita taṅ vanva kalakun</l>
    3575<l n="c">sakāmbah rāmyāsriṅ ta maṅinəpa samby āməṅ-aməṅa</l>
    .<l n="d">liniśyan[-liśyan] maṅlalaha lumipur kuṅ saṅ araras</l>
    .</lg>
    . <!-- 3 (b) L atīta (c) S anamby; Q -aməṅan (d) = LQ -->
    .<lg n="4"><l n="a">aneka lvirniṅ deśa tinəmuniran kapva ya mavit</l>
    3580<l n="b">sənāhāvvat pavvatnya tuhu sira yan śreṣṭhi guṇamān*</l>
    .<l n="c">yayā tan svaṅ-svaṅ deniran amaləsiṅ tuṣṭa dəmakan</l>
    .<l n="d">paḍāsrah ryy āmbəknya praṇamadara maṅkveṅ nr̥pasuta</l>
    .</lg>
    . <!-- 4 (b) R gunavan -->
    3585<lg n="5"><l n="a">asove yadyan varṇana lavas irān lampah aṅinəp</l>
    .<l n="b">ḍatəṅ rīndrapraṣṭhāta sira pinapagniṅ vvaṅ i daləm</l>
    .<l n="c">makādi [ṅ] kuntī paṇḍusuta karuhun dharmmatanaya</l>
    .<l n="d">hatur tejāndhākāra manahan ikaṅ vvaṅ sanagara</l>
    .</lg>
    3590 <!-- 5 (c) = L (d) S manah -->
    .<lg n="6"><l n="a">vavaṅ śrī kuntī harṣa siran aməkul pārthamahiṣī</l>
    .<l n="b">savetniṅ gə̄ṅ ny āmbəknira gərəmə de saṅ vahu ḍatəṅ</l>
    .<l n="c">sahôjar māskv induṅku bapa liṅ irāṅrəs kavətu luh</l>
    .<l n="d">ya rakvānləs ṅkāne gəluṅanira saṅ karva mararəm</l>
    3595</lg>
    . <!-- 6 (a) L pārthamahārṣi (b) Q savetnya for savetniṅ (c) S avətu (d) S rva for karva -->
    .<lg n="7"><l n="a">kunaṅ saṅ śrī dharmātmaja sira tikinn arddha magiraṅ</l>
    .<l n="b">lavan bhīma mvaṅ vīra nakula saṅ antən paḍa suka</l>
    .<l n="c">tumon pārthāpan vāhu maluy apupul digjaya tuvi</l>
    3600<l n="d">makolih hyaṅ-hyaṅniṅ yadu nagara sākṣāt kr̥tayaśa</l>
    .</lg>
    . <!-- AO: is tikin n / tikinn right here? !-->
    . <!-- 7 (c) Q valuy -->
    .<lg n="8"><l n="a">taṅeh lvirniṅ tuṣṭi nrəpati sakaḍatvan yan ujarən</l>
    3605<l n="b">parəṅ mantuk ri jro kalima sira saṅ paṇḍutanaya</l>
    .<l n="c">makeriṅ kuntī tan kari saṅ ahajə̄ṅ pārthavanitā</l>
    .<l n="d">təkap devī kr̥ṣṇāmvaṅi sira təlas marmma malulut</l>
    .</lg>
    . <!-- 8 (c) S pr̥thadayita for pārthavanitā -->
    3610<lg n="9"><l n="a">apūrvva lvirniṅ pūja paḍa sumənehāta ri sira</l>
    .<l n="b">śinantyan de saṅ brāhmaṇa nagara viprādi kuśala</l>
    .<l n="c">pənuh pvekaṅ pānotsava sahananiṅ maṅgala kabeh</l>
    .<l n="d">samanta strī kryan-kryan ta maṅuyut-uyut harṣa manivi</l>
    .</lg>
    3615 <!-- 9 (c) L pannotsava -->
    .<lg n="10"><l n="a">samaṅkā ryy āntuk phalguṇa makin agə̄ṅ taṅ kasuyaśan</l>
    .<l n="b">makin svastā ṅ rājyādhika pinahajə̄ṅ tan pavaraṇa</l>
    .<l n="c">śubhikṣa pva ṅ varṇāśrama sahananiṅ pora mapulih</l>
    .<l n="d">pratāpa śrī dharmātmaja parama divyāmayuṅi rāt</l>
    3620</lg>
    .</div>
    .<div type="canto" rend="met" n="62" met="jagaddhita">
    .<lg n="1"><l n="a">sāmpūrṇān kadi saṅ hyaṅ indra mapa haṅləvihi vibhava aṅlyabiṅ hajə̄ṅ</l>
    .<l n="b">eraṅ māryya kəta[ṅ] durātmaka viśīrṇa sulabha sira saṅ mahājana</l>
    3625<l n="c">ndin paṅlvaṅ pitutur mahārṣi mavarah patayaśa śapa taṅgvan indriya</l>
    .<l n="d">saṅkṣepanya kapat sapaṅgajaha saṅ r̥ṣi kuməmit i saṅ kaka sthiti</l>
    .</lg>
    . <!-- 1 (a) S sapa for mapa (b) S viśirana; = LQ -->
    .<lg n="2"><l n="a">śuddha bhyāṣa nireṅ prajā mahayu dharmma makasuluhiṅ aṇḍa maṇḍala</l>
    3630<l n="b">kyāti ṅ rāt varavīryya kaprabhun irānulusakəna surākṣaniṅ jagat</l>
    .<l n="c">tāvat dharmma ri saṅ kṣinatriya tan ora kahalanira saṅ pinaṇḍita</l>
    .<l n="d">vr̥ddhy ānūt kajanapriyan sira paṅə̄baniṅ agati mahāt pakāśrayan</l>
    .</lg>
    . <!-- 2 (b) Sira manulusakəna (c) S yavat -->
    3635<lg n="3"><l n="a">aṅhiṅ maṅkana tāntyaniṅ carita kastavanira hana riṅ jagaddhita</l>
    .<l n="b">ṅkā pārthāyaṇa saṅjña antukiṅ aṅatpada kumavih anirva-nirvakən</l>
    .<l n="c">olugnyān palalun təkap sujana tan katugəṭakəna mon dinuryyaśa</l>
    .<l n="d">paṅgil śrī suravīryya māsiha sirāṅanumata haməṅānya pet laṅə̄</l>
    .</lg>
    3640 <!-- 3 (b) L sajña; LQ kumavi -->
    .</div>
    . </div>
    . <div type="translation">
    .<div><p>May there be no hindrance! </p></div>
    3645<div type="canto" n="1">
    .<p rend="stanza" n="1"><l n="a">The supreme truth that flows from flavless aesthetic experience is brought to fulfilment by the existence of the poet.</l>
    .<l n="b">Absorbed in meditation, he finds harmony in the innermost part of his mind through unity with the rapturous beauty of the Lotus of Non-duality,</l>
    .<l n="c">And gives it visible form* in a <foreign>kakavin</foreign>, arranging it in lines, as the essence in the grooves [of the writing board] of the temple he builds with tendrils of beauty.</l>
    .<l n="d">Indeed, it is the subtle form of the spell which renders invisible the rising of love* and finally becomes inconceivable formlessness.</l>
    3650</p>
    .<p rend="stanza" n="2"><l n="a">For if the deity is praised according to the prescriptions, He becomes embodied in the beauty of sea and mountain.</l>
    .<l n="b">Clearly He merges with them, vanishing without trace into nothingness, inspiring the poetic sentiments that reach the ear.</l>
    .<l n="c">When the point of the stylus is completely worn away in the letters which form the black marks* on the writing board,</l>
    .<l n="d">In this way he, who in performing his act of worship, falls at His feet, frames his first praises.*</l>
    3655</p>
    .<p rend="stanza" n="3"><l n="a">Now I am enraptured, suddenly burdened with the desire to compose a poem* in homage to Beauty.</l>
    .<l n="b">But how can I possibly succeed? It can only bring great trouble. How can it be considered apposite?*</l>
    .<l n="c">For so deeply does the rumbling of the clouds stir me that I am compelled to take up writing board and stylus, </l>
    .<l n="d">Not cowering before the ignorance in my heart, but shamelessly and recklessly, longing only for skilfulness.</l>
    3660</p>
    .<p rend="stanza" n="4"><l n="a">When I ponder the evil nature of my fruitless existence, how cruel it seems. What can bring me contentment?</l>
    .<l n="b">Because wickedness is ever-present, filling me with sorrow, I have renounced the hope of ever being free of it.</l>
    .<l n="c">I secretly conceal my bewilderment and confusion, for there is no one to whom I can cry out for help, as I encounter the disfavour of fate.</l>
    .<l n="d">I want only to flee and dwell in a forest hermitage. There, alone, I may find peace.</l>
    3665</p>
    .<p rend="stanza" n="5"><l n="a">For any who seek such an end to wretchedness, there is the example* of the noble Arjuna,</l>
    .<l n="b">Who, when Dropadī was together with Yudhiṣṭhira, entered the inner chamber.</l>
    .<l n="c">This deed caused him such anguish that he, too, wanted nothing more than to go away and dwell in the forest, </l>
    .<l n="d">And seeking leave of the king, received his blessing before departing.</l></p>
    3670<p rend="stanza" n="6"><l n="a">The next morning, just as the rising sun shone forth in the eastern sky, the prince made ready.</l>
    .<l n="b">Having completed his devotions, he then went out of the city,</l>
    .<l n="c">His only companions his arrows, bow and armour, for these were the excellent weapons he bore,</l>
    .<l n="d">As is in accordance with the code of the warrior and is the way of those who seek to serve the world through valour.</l>
    .</p>
    3675<p rend="stanza" n="7"><l n="a">As he journeyed swiftly and without hindrance away from the kingdom, he was welcomed* by the beauties of nature.</l>
    .<l n="b">He came upon many splendid gardens on the outskirts of the palace.</l>
    .<l n="c">The trees, wrapped in mist, seemed to weep sorrowfully, as they cried aloud in their grief,* overwhelmed with longing.</l>
    .<l n="d">The young leaves of the beautiful sugar palms hung down in profusion, spreading outwards as if sighing with longing, giving free rein to their flowing tears.</l>
    .</p>
    3680<p rend="stanza" n="8"><l n="a">The prince continued on his way, journeying further and further from the town.</l>
    .<l n="b">When he looked back, the place he had left behind had a dismal appearance and seemed despondent.</l>
    .<l n="c">Without lustre, dejectedly hiding its charms, it seemed to want to keep itself hidden under a veil of grey.</l>
    .<l n="d">The glow of the half-risen sun was a red haze, like the bright glance of a girl dulled by yearning.</l>
    .</p>
    3685<p rend="stanza" n="9"><l n="a">Furthermore, the beauty along the delightful path he travelled, was the beauty of spring-time.</l>
    .<l n="b">Their freshness fading*, becoming limp, the tree branches tossed feverishly in the wind,</l>
    .<l n="c">Their rustling, the sighing plaint of a lover’s grief, their love for him unrequited.</l>
    .<l n="d">Their flowers, hanging down in abundance, fell to the ground all withered and lay scattered everywhere.</l>
    .</p>
    3690<p rend="stanza" n="10"><l n="a">There was* a young banyan tree and a number of fig trees rising on high, as well as <foreign>prih</foreign> and <foreign>bulu</foreign> trees.</l>
    .<l n="b">Everywhere, pecking birds thronged together, while yet others came flying through the air, darting to and fro amongst the trees.</l>
    .<l n="c">The mynah birds pretended to tease the parrots that joined them and drew near them respectfully.</l>
    .<l n="d">The voice of the <foreign>kuwong</foreign> sounded tremulously and was answered by the <foreign>walik,</foreign> lamenting that it had been abandoned by its mate, the <foreign>cucur.</foreign></l>
    .</p>
    3695<p rend="stanza" n="11"><l n="a">He arrived at the outlying districts where, in the fields on the mountain-slopes,</l>
    .<l n="b">Herders were tending their cattle, resting peacefully there, where land had been cleared for fields along the mountain ridges.</l>
    .<l n="c">Others were milking cows, for, since time immemorial, milk had been the produce that they took in homage to the palace</l>
    .<l n="d">At Indraprastha. Indeed, it is well known that this had always been their tribute and their prescribed duty.*</l>
    .</p>
    3700<p rend="stanza" n="12"><l n="a">A rain-filled cloud had just loosed its rain, sprinkling it down on the settlements in the ravines.</l>
    .<l n="b">Little by little, the breeze drove away the mist, leaving behind only the glow of the sun.</l>
    .<l n="c">The love-sick <foreign>cātaka</foreign> bird became so steeped in melancholy, as the clouds dispersed and went away to the beauty of the hills, </l>
    .<l n="d">That it moved the prince to join with it, in looking dejectedly at the sky.</l>
    .</p>
    3705<p rend="stanza" n="13"><l n="a">Unhurriedly, he travelled on, passing by the forest pavilions.</l>
    .<l n="b">The many hermitages and holy places he came upon were, in his view, all magnificent,</l>
    .<l n="c">As indeed were all the religious abodes, foundations, monasteries and fine temples, quite splendid.</l>
    .<l n="d">Some time later, as the sun was setting, he came to the River Saraswatī.</l>
    .</p>
    3710<p rend="stanza" n="14"><l n="a">Truly spotless were its excellent and sacred waters used as the means of purification in these forest hermitages.</l>
    .<l n="b">Moreover, within the enclosing walls of the artificial ponds they had formed a shallow <foreign>madraka</foreign> lake* that was without fault.</l>
    .<l n="c">Its beautiful inlets formed a sculpted perimeter,* presenting to the beholder a vast array of lotus blossoms.</l>
    .<l n="d">As proof that its deep waters were without defect, they seemed to proclaim its perfection.</l>
    .</p>
    3715<p rend="stanza" n="15"><l n="a">The prince’s heart was filled with delight as he looked at the beauty of the great river.</l>
    .<l n="b">Reminiscent of the charms of the tossing ocean was the rippling of the water, lapping and billowing.</l>
    .<l n="c">A breeze gently touching them and lifting them into flashes of light,</l>
    .<l n="d">The waves danced gaily, full of joy at meeting the noble Arjuna.</l>
    .</p>
    3720<p rend="stanza" n="16"><l n="a">White swans glided here and there in the middle of the river* seeming to wander in pursuit of beauty.</l>
    .<l n="b">Charmed, they listened intently to the buzzing of the bees, gaily courting [the flowers].</l>
    .<l n="c">As if to tell them of the purity of the river, the wind held them captive, teasing them, tossing and turning them from side to side,</l>
    .<l n="d">But they just continued bathing, quite indifferent to the profusion of lotuses there, where they were wading.</l>
    .</p>
    3725<p rend="stanza" n="17"><l n="a">Across the pond in the shallow water, moving with studied grace,* </l>
    .<l n="b">A duck and its mate moved off whispering endearments to each other.</l>
    .<l n="c">They stayed there among the lotuses, happy in their love-making, causing a shower of pollen* to fall.</l>
    .<l n="d">How sad* that the blue lotuses, shaken to and fro, were crushed by their beating wings.</l>
    .</p>
    3730<p rend="stanza" n="18"><l n="a">The green banks seemed to have been beautifully adorned and ornamented</l>
    .<l n="b">With moss,* which looked as though it had been scratched and seemed, appropriately, to imitate a dusting of powder,</l>
    .<l n="c">And, like the shaved eyebrows of a beautiful girl, clearly aroused desire,</l>
    .<l n="d">While the <foreign>pakis əndah</foreign> fern in the water was like fragrant musk,* its perfume melting* away.</l>
    .</p>
    3735<p rend="stanza" n="19"><l n="a">Bees flew in circles in search of virgin delights in the entrancing beauty of the lotus.</l>
    .<l n="b">Eagerly swarming to and fro, going longingly from flower to flower* to caress them, brushed gently by the pollen.</l>
    .<l n="c">Their buzzing was like thunder in the fourth month, and their tender cries of victory were as gentle and graceful</l>
    .<l n="d">As the murmuring of sacred syllables, their gift of homage to the prince, to bring him constant delight.*</l>
    .</p>
    3740<p rend="stanza" n="20"><l n="a">So he descended there, to wash his face and rinse his mouth in the ritual worship of the sun.</l>
    .<l n="b">His weariness vanished and when he had completed his devotions, his heart became all the more tranquil.</l>
    .<l n="c">Thereupon, he arose from the water, and again gave himself up to enjoyment, lying on a flat rock, </l>
    .<l n="d">And with delight, observed the shrimps that hid themselves behind the rocks and peeked out enticingly.*</l>
    .</p>
    3745<p rend="stanza" n="21"><l n="a">Amused he watched the <foreign>pingul</foreign>-fish* playing far out in the water.</l>
    .<l n="b">They teased each other, darting so swiftly back and forth that some sought shelter* under the rocks.</l>
    .<l n="c">There was great confusion in the river when, with great caution, the timid catfish came out, one after the other,</l>
    .<l n="d">But then, startled, dashed for cover* into the marsh-land as the birds swooped down on them.</l>
    .</p>
    3750<p rend="stanza" n="22"><l n="a">Even more enchanting was the wondrous mountain stream, which seemed to merge* into the sky,</l>
    .<l n="b">And, in the setting sun, with wilted flowers scattered on the rippling water, </l>
    .<l n="c">It took on* the beauty of embroidered cloth, like a blanket of brilliant stars,</l>
    .<l n="d">And seemed to make a perfect flower obeisance, as if to say this is our offering* to you - or so he thought.</l>
    .</p>
    3755<p rend="stanza" n="23"><l n="a">And the brightness of the <foreign>aśoka,</foreign>*<foreign> asana </foreign>and <foreign>bāṇa</foreign> flowers paled in the reflected light along the river-banks.</l>
    .<l n="b">The charms of the honey trees* faded and dimmed as their flower buds* were swept away,*</l>
    .<l n="c">Thinking only of how delightful it would be, never losing hope* that they might be sought out as the flower-ornaments* of lovers happening by.</l>
    .<l n="d">At peace, now that the bees had abandoned them and no longer sipped their perfume, they waited to fall.</l>
    .</p>
    3760<p rend="stanza" n="24"><l n="a">In all its beauty, it was a perfect bower for lovers to worship at the shrine of the pleasures of love.</l>
    .<l n="b">There were <foreign>tañjung</foreign> flowers, poignantly casting the message of the hidden perfume of their petals on the wind,*</l>
    .<l n="c">Giving forth such delightful fragrance that the blossoming <foreign>śikhari</foreign> could do nothing but seek cover behind the <foreign>wungū.</foreign></l>
    .<l n="d">Moreover,* arching over, flowers unfurled, they stood ready to watch over those tormented by pangs of love.</l>
    .</p>
    3765<p rend="stanza" n="25"><l n="a">Even as the sun began to set and the beauty of that place became dim and melancholy, still it was enchanting.</l>
    .<l n="b">It seemed a pity that no poet came wandering by on his journey, to tell of its charms on his writing board.</l>
    .<l n="c">When lo, a peacock appeared and stopped to rest there, for all the world like just such a wanderer in pursuit of beauty,</l>
    .<l n="d">So aptly storing in its poetic cries the delights of the Saraswatī River.</l>
    .</p>
    3770<p rend="stanza" n="26"><l n="a">With tranquil mind [Arjuna] lost himself in contemplation, as, preparing for what lay ahead,* he pondered thus:</l>
    .<l n="b">‘Successful are they who attain freedom from passion and think only of the ultimate goal of becoming a supreme sage.</l>
    .<l n="c">Yet because of the extent of the ten senses,* crushing the innermost recesses of the heart,* subjecting it to their will, </l>
    .<l n="d">Meditation on Śiwa is destroyed and annihilated and there is the risk that passion and darkness* will rise up.</l>
    .</p>
    3775<p rend="stanza" n="27"><l n="a">‘Only excellence of mind should be practised in order to reach the essence of existence.</l>
    .<l n="b">Clearly it is like the wheel of a chariot, which, if loosened, has no purpose at all.</l>
    .<l n="c">For the true nature of corporeal existence is nothing less than offering oneself up in sacrifice through excellent meritorious deeds.</l>
    .<l n="d">And so, clearly, in this life, the best course is to be willing to face the arduous task* of living virtuously.’</l>
    .</p>
    3780<p rend="stanza" n="28"><l n="a">This was the essence of his reflections on mastering the injunctions of the holy seers.</l>
    .<l n="b">As if in confusion the heart, subject as it is to the ten senses, turns this way and that, in every direction, when meditating.</l>
    .<l n="c">Disunity of mind then allows troubles to enter and brings aversion to the innermost secrets of meditation.</l>
    .<l n="d">And so, soothed by the rumbling voice of the <foreign>kuwong</foreign>, he then fell silent<foreign>.</foreign></l>
    .</p>
    3785</div>
    .<div type="canto" n="2">
    .<p rend="stanza" n="1"><l n="a">In the late afternoon he set off again,</l>
    .<l n="b">With his heart firmly fixed on his goal of reaching the Himālaya mountains.</l>
    .<l n="c">And as his journey took him to the east, effortlessly, along a flat valley road,</l>
    3790<l n="d">He was entranced at the sight of the birds, flying in formation, then vanishing from sight.</l>
    .</p>
    .<p rend="stanza" n="2"><l n="a">The faint fragrance of the forest flowers* wafting in the breeze, was delightful.</l>
    .<l n="b">His heart aflutter,* he hearkened to the buzzing of the bees.</l>
    .<l n="c">To him, their murmurs were the whisperings of those who know love for the first time,</l>
    3795<l n="d">And the intermittent cries of the magnificent peacocks delighted him.</l>
    .</p>
    .<p rend="stanza" n="3"><l n="a">From* clusters of forest flowers, fragrance spread like falling rain,</l>
    .<l n="b">As the gentle breeze hunted them out, enhancing their radiant beauty.</l>
    .<l n="c">Flowers lay scattered, some like fallen arrows,* others intertwined </l>
    3800<l n="d">In the thickets of <foreign>luruk-luruk, </foreign>like flowers in a hair-knot.*</l>
    .</p>
    .<p rend="stanza" n="4"><l n="a">In the heat, the <foreign>suḍa,</foreign>* its creepers unfurling, wilted too, sad and downcast.</l>
    .<l n="b">A profusion of <foreign>katirah</foreign> hung down, its aerial shoots* throwing themselves to the ground,* moving to and fro imploringly.</l>
    .<l n="c"><foreign>Pakis haji </foreign>ferns shook and in frenzied longing hid themselves away,</l>
    3805<l n="d">While <foreign>wəlas-harəp</foreign> creepers formed a concealing curtain for a lover’s retreat.</l>
    .</p>
    .<p rend="stanza" n="5"><l n="a">The buds of the <foreign>mangunəng</foreign> creeper* hung limply and seemed dull as the sun’s rays beat down on them.</l>
    .<l n="b">Weary, sighing plaintively, their supple boughs bending low without strength, they waited for the thunder.</l>
    .<l n="c">Huddled in their sheaths, the <foreign>gəsing</foreign> bamboos rustled in the awesome grip of passion,</l>
    3810<l n="d">Restive, as the <foreign>prabhu sanmata</foreign> enclosed them in its soft embrace.</l>
    .</p>
    .<p rend="stanza" n="6"><l n="a">The dense thickets were hidden from view* under a tangle of fearful creepers,</l>
    .<l n="b">That hung upside down, covering* the pendant <foreign>halikukun,</foreign> unfurling there.</l>
    .<l n="c">The <foreign>kayən</foreign> trees which rose up in the valleys, burst into blossom and held themselves in readiness.</l>
    3815<l n="d">In the stillness, a <foreign>cəb luput</foreign> bird opened wide its eyes, as a mouse scuttled by.</l>
    .</p>
    .<p rend="stanza" n="7"><l n="a">Let us pass over the time when the prince wound his way through the forest. </l>
    .<l n="b">Here he traversed a deep water-course, there ravines and rugged mountains, difficult of access,* </l>
    .<l n="c">But he was content as he sought his destination – the source of that river of flawless purity,</l>
    3820<l n="d">And there, in a welcoming hermitage, he found shelter for the night.*</l>
    .</p>
    .<p rend="stanza" n="8"><l n="a">Faithful to his [vow] of striving for detachment,* the prince again sought solitude,</l>
    .<l n="b">The wooded hills* his sole companions as he travelled on.</l>
    .<l n="c">And they, determined to receive him with joy as an honoured guest, offered their many fruits to him.</l>
    3825<l n="d">While, nearby, a splendid waterfall readied itself to be his holy bathing place.</l>
    .</p>
    .<p rend="stanza" n="9"><l n="a">He came at last to the Hima mountain, with its splendid settlements.</l>
    .<l n="b">It was as resplendent as the abode of the gods in the glow of the setting sun.</l>
    .<l n="c">White clouds enshrouded it like magnificent battlements,</l>
    3830<l n="d">And it seemed to have exchanged its beauty* for that of the heavens.</l>
    .</p>
    .</div>
    .<div type="canto" n="3">
    .<p rend="stanza" n="1"><l n="a">The beautiful mountain scenery seemed to be in restless motion.</l>
    3835<l n="b">As if calling to him, the casurinas rustled, tossing and turning in the wind.</l>
    .<l n="c">Waiting expectantly, the dancing branches* whispered,</l>
    .<l n="d">Their graceful, overhanging shoots ever reaching out to him.</l>
    .</p>
    .<p rend="stanza" n="2"><l n="a">On the densely-forested slopes were gardens, </l>
    3840<l n="b">All the more beautiful for they were shafted with bands* of golden sunlight.</l>
    .<l n="c">With infinite care, they had adorned themselves delightfully with flowers, their blossoms agleam, </l>
    .<l n="d">And seemed to have decorated themselves for joy that Arjuna, the son of Pāṇḍu, was visiting* there.</l>
    .</p>
